job_name: Ann'S 品牌女鞋新竹門市正職銷售人員(月均薪3萬5-8萬)
cust_name: Ann'S_紘瑞國際股份有限公司
job_detail:
Ann’S女鞋品牌於2003年成立，提供全尺碼34-43號「解決腳型痛點」打造內外兼具舒適又好看的美鞋。特別針對「拇指外翻」、「腳版較寬」、「易磨腳」等困擾，開發出「加寬版楦頭」、「沙發後跟」等獨家款設計，造福愛美卻又怕傷腳的廣大女性！，深受多位女星、部落客、麻豆等名人的喜愛以及消費者的支持。

Ann’S品牌虛實整合的服務優勢，未來將持續積極拓增服務版圖！
歡迎喜歡打扮、個性活潑、態度積極者的你，一同加入我們的團隊！

【工作內容為】
1.銷售商品
2.進出貨管理
3.顧客服務
4.品牌形象大使

●上班時間：14:00~22:00（月休8天）

【多元獎金制度，銷售更有目標】
1.重視團隊精神，沒有惡性競爭的個績制度，創造良好合作的工作氛圍。
2.具競爭力的薪酬制度 (當日達標獎金、特殊獎勵金…等)

【教育資源與順暢升遷管道】
1.新人職前訓練、在職訓練、進階培訓…等。
2.豐富的教育訓練課程 (內訓、外訓)。
3.完整升遷考核制度 (升遷考核、每半年/年度考核)。

享勞健保、勞退、業績獎金，工作滿一年享年終獎金、年假、員旅補助
本公司相當重視積極的工作態度和團隊合作的精神，並具有抗壓性善溝通者佳！
未來培訓計畫：活動企劃、商品管理、公關能力、人資培訓
升遷管道：正式銷售人員→儲備幹部→店長→區域督導/開放加盟
other:
＊本公司相當重視積極的工作態度和團隊合作的精神並具有抗壓性善溝通者佳。
＊月休8天未來可升遷為Ann'S儲備幹部培訓。

job_name: (年後即上班/3天內盡速回覆!)【固定中/夜班、無經驗可】物管倉庫作業技術員(倉儲OP)
cust_name: 泰詠電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
★不用擔心年後轉職潮競爭激烈★
若你正在尋找一份長期穩定的公司、工作機會，
那泰詠將會是你的最佳選擇，我們是『已經成立32年的上櫃電子科技業』，
並一直保有三大堅持:『不裁員!不減薪!不放無薪假!』，
現在已穩定連續獲利12年以上，近期更是不斷在擴編人力！

因此只要現在就點選《應徵加入》，《3個工作天內》將盡速回覆邀約並安排面試！
讓你安心過年，年後即上班!

【職務內容】
1、須於廠內負責清點物料品項數量。
2、負責倉儲系統之key in與操作，並按照每日排程準備生產物料
3、共同執行倉庫定期盤點及環境6S。
4、其他主管交辦事項。

【薪資掌握在你手! 角色越多，薪資越高!】
年薪平均14個月(第一年依在職天數比例換算)，若能力持續提升另有調薪的機會，
且每月計入加班費，有機會可達$40,000以上！

【就業/轉職首選，不可錯過泰詠的理由！】
1、溫適度控管，環境乾淨有冷氣，工作起來更舒適。
2、不需穿著整套無塵衣，半身防靜電衣穿脫好便利。
3、室內汽機車免費停車場，讓你的愛車可以遮風避雨。
4、加班機會多，且加班費比照勞基法發放。
5、固定班別、不需日夜輪調，再也不用調時差。
6、設有季獎金、三節獎金、各類節慶禮金禮品、年終尾牙...等福利。
7、多站點工作機會，開放多元崗位，學習不設限。

job_name: (年後即上班/3天內盡速回覆!)【日班技術員】加班機會多且不須輪班，年薪平均14個月!
cust_name: 泰詠電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
★不用擔心年後轉職潮競爭激烈★
若你正在尋找一份長期穩定的公司、工作機會，

因此只要現在就點選《應徵加入》，《3個工作天內》將盡速回覆邀約並安排面試！
讓你安心過年，年後即上班!

【職務內容】
1、熟悉產品SOP，依照SOP執行當站作業，遵守6S。 
2、執行細緻、敏捷之手工作業、機台操作。
3、獨立作業，針對當站異常能即時排除問題。
4、熟悉作業手法以及品質標準，提升作業品質與效率。
5、配合不同製程、多站點之調度，完成主管交辦有關生產產品、程序事宜。

★歡迎『無相關經驗，欲轉換產業的求職者！』★
比起相關經驗，我們更重視特質，
歡迎具有『抗壓性、企圖心、肯學肯問、積極學習新事物』的求職者加入！

【薪資掌握在你手! 角色越多，薪資越高!】
年薪平均14個月(第一年依在職天數比例換算)，若能力持續提升另有調薪的機會，
且每月計入加班費，有機會可達$40,000以上！

【就業/轉職首選，不可錯過泰詠的理由！】
1、溫適度控管，環境乾淨有冷氣，工作起來更舒適。
2、不需穿著整套無塵衣，半身防靜電衣穿脫好便利。
3、室內汽機車免費停車場，讓你的愛車可以遮風避雨。
4、加班機會多，且加班費比照勞基法發放。
5、固定班別、不需日夜輪調，再也不用調時差。
6、設有季獎金、三節獎金、各類節慶禮金禮品、年終尾牙...等福利。
7、多站點工作機會，開放多元崗位，學習不設限。
other:
【需配合加班】
平日需配合至少2~3天加班，六日至少1天

周日至周四 早班1030-1730，晚班1430-2130
周五至周六 早班1030-1730，晚班1500-2200

資深學姊/主管專業手把手教育訓練，讓你快速上手成為即戰力！

1. 進貨清點/入庫(不定時需搬重物)

*屬於小家電倉儲，多數產品重量不重，不會太頻繁的搬重物，但偶爾仍會遇到需要搬重的產品，請斟酌自己的體能狀況再投遞。

*細心、動作迅速確實、有效率、具高度應變能力、負責主動積極樂於學習。
*試用期3個月，通過試用者依其工作能力表現上調薪資。
*需要有良好的邏輯觀念，以應付查找庫存差異的狀況。

job_name: 網紅KOL&社群直播主開發業務
cust_name: 耀威生物科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們是深耕台灣20年的電商品牌，與眾家廠商密切合作，我們正在尋求數位開發運營團購主與企業的合作夥伴。

網購蓬勃Facebook / Line / IG 等私域流量團購是近年來成長速度非常快的銷售模式，計畫加深網紅KOL與社群經營業務量能，若有與KOL網紅合作經驗佳，希望至少有一年以上相關資歷。

主要工作內容為：
1、開發KOL/KOC 社群團購合作
  a. 商品內容企劃設計
  b. 社群團購活動提案企劃，報價與方案執行
  c. 社群銷售目標設定與達成率執行
  d. 社群團購數據分析
2、直播主等社交團購通路業務開發
3、銷售商品基礎文案撰寫與規劃
4、產品廣告素材整理和內容規劃
5、其他線上通路和實體通路合作的開發
6、其他主管交辦事項

必備條件為：
1.業務工作經驗1年以上
2.認真負責、積極開發業務賺取業績獎金
3.需要建立並經營團購主的關係，做好檔期規劃安排
4.即時反映市場動態達到有效行銷目標達成

薪資福利：
底薪28k-50k面議，獎金另計無上限
同時享有公司相關福利制度

此為公司全新業務部門，開發一個全新的市場模式，超過10年的堅強採購、倉儲、資訊、等等內勤團隊作後盾，公司將全力支持有實戰經驗的您，與團隊一起打拼團購與企業市場，歡迎一同加入我們！

cust_name: 泰詠電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Summary】
針對客戶需求之SAP開發專案，與ABAP工程師共同合作進行需求分析及程式開發，以滿足組織需求；讓使用者改變作業習慣，進而更依賴SAP系統而非線外報表進行作業，提升作業效能。
若針對既有之資訊專案能有效完成，將有機會主導跨系統之大型專案，成為獨當一面的專業PM。

【Responsibility & Duties】
1. 須主導所負責之SAP專案，並進行系統分析。
2. 須撰寫所負責專案之開發規格書，優化操作使用手冊。
3. 與使用者進行訪談，以針對其需求解決系統問題。
4. 針對所擅長之模組協助功能主管進行使用怎操作之教學設計。
5. 與其他夥伴一起合作完成各項資訊專案及主管交辦任務。

若您 對於能獨立主導資訊專案有積極企圖，樂於從程式開發的角度切入並嘗試突破及開展自我，歡迎您主動投遞泰詠電子!

cust_name: 泰詠電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
★不用擔心年後轉職潮競爭激烈★
若你正在尋找一份長期穩定的公司、工作機會，
那泰詠將會是你的最佳選擇，我們是『已經成立32年的上櫃電子科技業』，
並一直保有三大堅持:『不裁員!不減薪!不放無薪假!』，
現在已穩定連續獲利12年以上，近期更是不斷在擴編人力！

因此只要現在就點選《應徵加入》，《3個工作天內》將盡速回覆邀約並安排面試！
讓你安心過年，年後即上班!

【職務內容】
1、須於廠內負責清點物料品項數量。
2、負責倉儲系統之key in與操作，並按照每日排程準備生產物料
3、共同執行倉庫定期盤點及環境6S。
4、其他主管交辦事項。

【薪資掌握在你手! 角色越多，薪資越高!】
年薪平均14個月(第一年依在職天數比例換算)，若能力持續提升另有調薪的機會，
且每月計入加班費，有機會可達$40,000以上！

【就業/轉職首選，不可錯過泰詠的理由！】
1、溫適度控管，環境乾淨有冷氣，工作起來更舒適。
2、不需穿著整套無塵衣，半身防靜電衣穿脫好便利。
3、室內汽機車免費停車場，讓你的愛車可以遮風避雨。
4、加班機會多，且加班費比照勞基法發放。
5、固定班別、不需日夜輪調，再也不用調時差。
6、設有季獎金、三節獎金、各類節慶禮金禮品、年終尾牙...等福利。
7、多站點工作機會，開放多元崗位，學習不設限。

job_name: IC 驗證工程師 (Design Verification Engineer) (新竹)
cust_name: 毅誠電子有限公司
job_detail:
Use System Verilog and UVM verification methodology to verify front-end RTL ASIC designs for data storage systems.
使用System Verilog和UVM的驗證方法來驗證針對資料儲存系統所設計的RTL數位電路。


You will
Responsible for verification of the digital design, golden models using methodologies such as UVM
Understand the design and operation sequence, develop verification structure and verify the correctness of the design.
Learn the essence of Verification skill and Storage domain knowledge

Bottom-up testbench construction:
From Block level verification to SoC verification. Provide corresponding material / IPs based on your learning curve.

Qualifications
1. Willing to learn
2. Highly proactive and open-minded
3. Smart guys
我們是一群喜歡學習，主動積極，聰明的人，想找尋擁有一樣特性的人一起加入新創公司。

Preferred requirement
1. Master degree in EE or CS
2. Familiar with System Verilog and UVM
3. Familiar with storage system
4. Familiar with verilog and digital design


驗證是大多數數位IC設計相關的學校科系課程較少提到的領域，
如果您是畢業生或是剛入業界的人
  熟悉Verilog / C
  理解數位電路 
  略微研讀過UVM
  想挑戰去驗出design最深層的bug

都歡迎附上您的履歷

job_name: HR - HR Services Representative (Korean speaking) - Hsinchu - J-00259911-287
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
This role will be based in Hsinchu Taiwan and is responsible for handling transaction. You will actively contact with employees, managers and HR colleagues in Asia by providing operational solutions to the in-scope processes.

Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You will be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.

Role and responsibilities
This role will be responsible for completing a wide variety of HR duties that reflect substantial variety and complexity for one or more countries, including but not limit to: transaction handling, legal compliance measurement, report generation and analysis, presentation delivery. The work of position is generally of critical and confidential nature. He/she will be trained on Human Resources practices, policies, procedures, and systems.

Provide transactional system support, administrative services and proactively complete the in-scope processes.
Perform presentation and guidance call to internal stakeholders.
Actively identifies customer requirement and participates in improvement projects.
Drive standardization, simplification and automation of the processes.
Ensure service level agreements are met and higher level of customer satisfaction is reached.
Safeguard own knowledge & skills and update knowledge database in line with local compliance.

Education and experience
Bachelor or Master degree in HR or related fields.
2-3 years of HR or related experience.
Multi-culture experience is a plus.
Workday or ServiceNow experience is a plus.
Korean speaking
 
Skills
Fluent in English and Korean; able to communicate with multinational colleagues on day-to-day basis. Japanese or Korean is a plus.
Ability to consistently deliver high quality customer service in a professional and efficient manner.
Knowledge of HR processes, systems and policies.
Ability to work in a changing environment to meet demanding deadlines and timescales.
Proactive attitude and eagerness to learn.

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
This role is under People Services Asia transaction team. We aim to provide solutions and high quality of HR activities. You will touch whole HR polices and end to end process from offering to retire and co-work with internal/external stakeholders, such as HRBP, managers, employee and vendors. You will represent team to participate in global or regional projects and meeting.

High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.

job_name: D&E - Algorithm & Software Development Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00247309-279
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Join ASML Hermes Microvision (HMI) software team, you will work on most advanced E-beam Inspection tool in the industry. You will co-work with technical experts across difference country in the world to develop high performance and quality software system for the products. Our goal is to provide the best solution to customer for leading semiconductor manufacturing technology.

Role and responsibilities
The mission of the senior software engineer is to be part of the core software development team and contribute to cutting edge algorithms for E-beam inspection and metrology, focusing on machine learning, image processing, computer vision, defect detection and classification

Develop and implement computer vision and machine learning algorithms to various SEM patterns/layers, help to build machine learning based image quality enhancement platform for E-beam tools.
- Lead the team to build and deploy groundbreaking AI models and work closely with product team to meet customer needs
- Conducting research and develop state-of-the-art algorithms for quality enhancement, segmentation and pattern recognition
- Partner with high performance computing team and DevOp team to establish the best strategies to achieve the highest performance and throughput
- Conduct independent research and provide solutions to challenge problems in industry

Education and experience
Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or relevant field of study.  Ph.D. preferred

5 - 7 years

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

- A minimum of 5 years of solid C++ development experience is required to implement deliverables and efficient algorithms in our E-Beam systems.
- Knowledge about machine learning/ deep learning product developments and deployment strategies
- Strong knowledge of the state-of-the-art in computer vision algorithms and techniques; deep understanding of machine learning and deep learning

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

job_name: Intern - International Mobility Assignment Team Intern (1 year contract) - Hsinchu - J-00262827-075
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
ASML has employees over 60 locations in 16 countries and the business requires travel between countries. IMO team is a department build to assists worldwide employees with their business travel immigration documents and ensure they are compliant to local regulations

The International Mobility Office Intern will support the team members in administration work and keeping documents up to date according to instructions. The role will also be required to attend internal calls, take meeting minutes, and from time to time follow up on vendor actions.

If you want to immersed yourself in an open, international environment and ready to take on challenges, ASML looks forward to seeing you.

Role and responsibilities
To support IMO assignment team on day to day operation matters

To keep internal and external documents and templates up to date
To preside internal and external meetings, take meeting notes, and follow up action items with the action owners
To create instructional video related to immigration or any mobility related topic
To check vendor actions completeness
To perform monthly tasks assigned by the team assistants
To execute tasks assigned by manager

Education and experience
Bachelor/Master in business, management, English is a plus 

• Strong command in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint  
• Good command in written and spoken English
• Strong academic performance and prior work/internship experience is a plus

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

• Can-do mentality, not afraid to raise questions
• Able to finish tasks under limited time
• Attentiveness to accuracy and detail
• Ability to multi-task and prioritize given tasks efficiently

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
*Work-time: at least 24 hours per week, preferably can work 4-5 days per week

job_name: HR - HR Services Representative (Japanese speaking) - Hsinchu - J-00252057-963
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
This role will be based in Hsinchu Taiwan and is responsible for interacting with employees, managers and HR colleagues in Asia by providing insights and solutions to diverse scenarios via our HR systems or phone.

This role will be responsible for completing a wide variety of HR duties that reflect substantial variety and complexity for one or more countries, including but not limit to: data collection, communication, inquire handling, compliance, report generation. This position’s work is generally of critical and confidential nature. He/she will be trained on Human Resources practices, policies, procedures, and systems.

Role and responsibilities
First point of contact for employees and managers for all general HR topics. Provide self-service support and ensure accurate and effective transactions and prompt inquiry resolution.

Handle inquiries from first contact, registration, escalating and resolving queries in a professional and efficient manner - in a first time right and end-to-end way of working.
Support customers on the HR portal and relevant online tools in completing transactions.
Provide operational advisory support and administrative services to in-scope processes.
Perform customer related data gathering.
Work according defined standards, in line with end-to-end processes and local compliancy.
Escalate cases where guidance and clarification of policies and procedures is required.
Actively identifies customer centric improvements and participates in improvement projects. Drive standardization, simplification and automation of the relevant processes.
Ensure service level agreements are met and higher level of customer satisfaction is reached.
Safeguard own knowledge & skills and update knowledge database.

Education and experience
Bachelor or Master degree in HR or related fields
3-5 years experience in Workday or ServiceNow could be a big plus
Japanese speaking

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Fluent in English and Japanese; able to communicate with multinational colleagues on day-to-day basis 
Ability to consistently deliver high quality customer service in a professional and efficient manner.
Knowledge of HR processes, systems and policies.
Consulting agility & style flexibility to understand customer needs and deal with a broad range of customers.
Ability to quickly find your way in a network of information
Ability to work in a changing environment to meet demanding deadlines and timescales.

Other information
This role is under Asia people service advisory team, report to team lead. We aim to provide solutions & communications to individual related activities in HR areas. You will touch whole HR polices and end2end process from offering to retire, that’s why we need you to providing professional solutions to stakeholders (HRBP, Managers and employees). Besides that you will represent team to participate in Global or Regional projects and meeting.

High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.

job_name: Marketing - Technical Project Manager - Hsinchu - J-00262018-700
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Do you ever wonder where those beautiful images come from that show the tiny structures that build up the chip powering your next iPhone ?
HMI is a part of ASML, and builds e-beam inspection and metrology systems. As a technical project manager you play a pivotal role in demonstrating new tools’ capabilities to our customers and collaborating with coworkers to develop solutions for future nodes

Role and responsibilities
Your mission is to support e-beam technology development to meet customer next generation requirements for inspection, metrology and holistic process control, by efficient project execution and account support

Responsible for
Initiation and execution of projects to demonstrate product value and support customer node development
Close engagement with customers to understand requirements, translate into deliverables and drive to solution
Leading a team of experts to drive projects to success
Providing technical input to sales and marketing for roadmap development and business decisions

Education and experience
M.Sc. and above in Material Science, Electrical Engineering, Physics, and/or Chemical Engineering

7 - 10 years in semi-conductor industry

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Self-driving
Strong collaborator
Must be able to work independently, pro-active

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
The position is located in Hsinchu – Taiwan.
You will be part of the Taiwan WWATS organization, but as a project manager your direct reporting line will be to US.
For this role you will support major customers in China, and you collaborate with the Taiwan team and ASML HQ in The Netherlands. You are expected to build up a TW-based team to support the projects and use TW resources to deliver solutions for customer problems

High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.

 

Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML? Read our frequently asked questions.

cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Role and responsibilities

As a Finance Controller, you are expected to create & maintain clear insight in the nature and background of financial reporting for the ASML/Cymer Taiwan legal entities. You will operate in a matrix organization, being part of the global Finance organization. You will ensure that the financial statements are correct and complete creating the basis for a clean audit trail – with proper substantiation and specification. Being able to make the translation between our primary US GAAP books and Local GAAP financial statements and into the indirect and direct tax obligations is crucial in this role.

 Your responsibilities are as follows:

 (1)    Financial Reporting and control all aspects of accounting and finance operations

(2)    Manage, administer, and control all aspects of ethical behavior and business practices in accordance with ASML/Cymer’s Code of Conduct including:

(3)    Financial planning and analysis

(4)    SOX and Audit Coordination

(5)    Direct and Indirect tax compliance


Education and experience
 
- Minimum 12 years’ experience with either Taiwan/US CPA qualified or at least 5 years’ Big 4 or equivalent accounting experience in an international business environment

- Strong understanding of financial accounting processes; Experience with automation of reporting processes in a SAP/Oracle environment and/or experience with e.g. robotics is a prefer

- Experience with Taiwanese tax compliance and tax certificate report preparation

- Knowledge of / experience with applicable tax accounting rules in relation to US GAAP / IFRS / Local GAAP and related processes

- Fluent in written & spoken English and Chinese

 
Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

-Good analytical, communicative, leadership and social skills. Professional and ambitious attitude. Result oriented, team player with a big sense of responsibility;

-Capable of co-working with team members while maintaining higher level overview;

- Ability to build relationships with colleagues in other regions (Asia / Europe / US) and non-financial departments.

How easy is it nowadays to travel to other countries for work? You will find that out within our team because you support business travelers (global) in the area of immigration, social security and tax related matters

You will start your job in the Immigration&travel team, this is one of our sub teams within People Services Europe. People Services is the people contact center for employees and managers within Europe and is responsible for managing all Hire2Retire Operational processes. People Services Europe exist of around 90 employees all based in the Netherlands.
The immigration&travel team is the only team that is working global within People Services Europe. Most of the colleagues are based in the Netherlands, one other colleague is based in Taiwan.

You are responsible for interacting with general management, HR managers and employees by providing insights and solutions to diverse scenarios by phone, mail or via our HR systems.
You will be part of a dynamic team within People Services organization in a fast growing and continuously changing international high tech company, with lots of career and development opportunities.

Responsible for the correct application of visa and work permits for the customers
Responsible for submitted information and ensure that all required information is complete and correct;
Responsible for initiations to external vendors if they have to start the visa or work permit processes;

Answer questions of customers on application status and check with vendors on agreed deadlines;
Sharing, obtaining and maintaining knowledge is key;
Deliver based on agreements (KPI/SLA);
Drive high standards and first time right service delivery;
Drive efficiency improvements while also keeping the customer needs in mind

job_name: 軟體開發_後端/全端工程師(新竹廠)R08
cust_name: 友達光電股份有限公司
job_detail:
Job Description:
歡迎對軟體開發有熱情並勇於挑戰的你加入我們，一同透過軟體技術與服務整合，在不同場域的解決方案中，實現以人為核心的顯示器無所不在曼妙生活。
我們期待在了解公司Go Vertical場域應用的產品及商業需求，夥伴能與軟體企劃及UX/UX同仁合作進行相關軟體服務之開發設計與維護，因此後端/全端工程師將有以下工作：

【工作內容】
1. 依照SA開立之規格，透過Web後端系統架構分析設計，開發高效率、高安全、高彈性的軟體服務。
2. 具備全端技術能力尤佳。

【技能與經驗條件】
1. 熟悉Web框架、具Web服務(RESTful、GraphQL)開發經驗
2. 熟資料庫語法與運用(SQL/NoSQL)
3. 具大型Web系統開發經驗。
4. 熟悉Azure、AWS，具備CI/CD知識
5. 熟悉UML和log trace tools

【加分要件】
1. 有高併發或C10K問題解決經驗佳。
2. 懂容器化相關知識，有Docker、k8S使用經驗佳。

#軟體開發
#後端開發
#全端開發
#API
#RESTful
#SQL

job_detail:

工作內容：
1. 門市日常營運，銷售小米 全系列產品、副廠產品及公司主推產品，以利業績達成。
2. 產品諮詢及專業建議、售後服務與產品保固、裝置保險等…介紹。
3. 確保門市賣場的產品安全性與環境清潔度，符合原廠稽核規範。

5. 秉持卓越的服務精神，用心款待每一位顧客。
6. 配合公司商圈規劃進行分發與輪調歷練。
7. 主管交辦事項、門市行政工作。

工作優勢：
1. 前六個月保障薪獎3萬3千元起 (完整給予六個足月)。
2. 前三個月新人業績目標減免 (新人可充分學習與培訓)。
3. 位於新竹知名熱鬧商場、交通便捷、人流量高(業績有保障)。
4. 每年萬元福利，完整照顧每位員工 (長期任職沒煩惱)。

出勤制度：
早班 11:00AM、晚班 13:00PM、每班8小時(不含用餐1小時)。
每月休假依當月週六、週日天數及國定假日天數排休(8-11天不等，例2022十月排休11天)。

福利制度：
1. 員工團體保險
2. 員工結婚津貼
3. 員工生育津貼
4. 員工通話費補助

job_name: CS - Equipment Performance Coordinator - Hsinchu - J-00261306-032
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Role and responsibilities
• Monitors and Analyze the machine performance indicators at the Customers site by using standard reporting tooling.
• Regularly reports the machine performance towards the Customer and Veldhoven including advices and bottlenecks.
• Makes plans in cooperation with the Customer to actively implement Solutions it terms of Patches, FCA, FCO,s etc in order to optimize
the machine performance.
• Responsible for HW and SW FCO coordination.
• Makes improvement plans for “Under Performing Machines” to minimize the performance variance.
• Makes sure that every Down longer then 4 hours is being evaluated and that a Long Down Report is send to Veldhoven for WW
evaluation.
• Makes sure that the relevant performance data is collected and send to Veldhoven.
• Makes sure that the reconciliation process is locally in place and actively driven.
• Escalates problems to CS per ASML procedure including complete and accurate data and problem descriptions.
• Coordinates the various resources in different locations to solve escalated technical problems.
• Has a regular communication with the relevant Working Supervisor or Fab Team Leader.
• Recommends Return Of Investments proposals to the Customer for applicable solutions.
• Ensures required technical and administrative documentation is completed in a clear, concise and timely manner. Informs all parties
affected by assignments of progress/problems in a timely manner.
• Ensure proper written and oral communications occur with all affected parties. Prepare and make presentations as required.

Education and experience
• Requires engineering degree (EE) or equivalent experience.
• Requires in semiconductor or related industry and an in-depth understanding of ASML products and operations.

Skills

You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

• Effective interpersonal skills and the ability to direct activities of others to accomplish goals.
• Ability to draw conclusions from written or computer generated reports, ability to analyze data or report information, conduct research,
search for solutions to problems.
• Implement recommendations by coordinating people and/or other resources..

job_name: 軟體開發_PM/專案經理(新竹廠)R08
cust_name: 友達光電股份有限公司
job_detail:
友達以深厚的面板研發及製造經驗為基礎，及領先全球多項技術的創新為能量，啟動「雙軸轉型計畫」。計畫以升級顯示技術附加價值（Go Premium）和深化垂直市場應用（Go Vertical）為兩大軸心，來進行數位化轉型，整合軟體，硬體，雲端與服務平台，進軍場域經濟的多元市場，發展應用於育樂、零售、醫療、交通、製造等多面向智慧解決方案。歡迎對軟體開發有熱情、對各場域解決方案有想法的夥伴們，加入我們起飛的行列！

【工作任務】

1. 帶領5人以上之專案團隊進行軟體產品開發，以Agile或Hybrid方式執行專案管理，使用ClickUp專案管理工具並產生相關報表。
2. 進行專案可行性評估，撰寫評估報告，若為外部標案則需與團隊合作撰寫建議書。
3. 專案執行前撰寫專案計劃書，包含WBS與各階段目標，規劃相關資源運用與時程進度。
4. 進行內部跨單位協調，與外部合作夥伴溝通。
5. 主導專案流程與文件產出，確保工作流程與產品品質。

【工作條件】
1. 視專案需要，使用英文與客戶溝通。
2. 可配合國內短期工作異地辦公和出差。
3. 曾帶領過5人以上專案團隊，完整執行SSDLC完整軟體開發流程。
4. 熟悉Waterfall, Agile或Hybrid專案管理方法及專案管理工具，會使用ClickUp尤佳。 
5. 曾參與軟硬體產品整合開發案，具備商業模式概念及執行方法者尤佳。
6. 具備在智慧醫療、教育、娛樂、零售、製造、交通等相關場域產品開發經驗。 
7. 態度積極樂觀，善於提升團隊工作士氣。 
8. 具備 PMP, PMI-ACP, CSM 等管理相關證照者尤佳。

#PM #Project #Product

job_name: CRE - Real Estate and Facilities Management Specialist - Hsinchu - J-00253931-361
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Do you have experience of employee relations communication? Are you good at human resource management, plant general affairs and facility management, space planning and administrative general affairs resource integration multiple and cross-function experiences? If so, we are looking for you,  welcome to join our world-class FM team

Role and responsibilities
The purpose of the Soft Service Specialist with the role of transition specialist is to develop, maintain and execute the service concept for all the buildings, services and work environments of ASML in the region. Also to develop and deploy a change approach for introducing, transition and implementing new work place concepts. There is related to work places, employee services. All of this based on and executed within CRE’s strategic pillars (Safety, TCO, Flexibility, Business Alignment, Wellbeing and Sustainability). Soft services specialists are responsible for managing the soft services in the region (TW/SG)

*Translate the vision on services and workplaces to requirements for soft services management for ASML. Include relevant themes like wellbeing and sustainability and translate these to service requirements, service delivery plans and supplier
contracts for supplier.

*Together with expert suppliers make a translation of the vision and needs of the business to polices, guidelines and process for soft services in alignment with the requirements. Together achieve the best-fit approach balancing the required performance and service levels yet considering aspects like risks/criticality and costs.

*Together with CRE Business partners (CRE Regional Facility Manager and the Delivery & Supply Soft Service Manager) ,Act as overall advisor and communicator for various soft service aspects, collect the needs of the business and employees in order to determine the best-fit service delivery plans.

* Establish and optimize the soft services processes of effective service delivery to assure that all services related to the workplace.

*Support the Regional Housing & Workplace Manager with the development of the (long term) transition management strategy.

*Responsible to manage the OPEX /CAPEX budget for the related scope. Building the operating budget and logic allocation of budget in the supply chain together with Contract & Supplier Managers.

Education and experience
Bachelor / Master degree in business administration, hospitality management, facility management or similar.

*At least 5~7 years of relevant experience in an international high tech industrial environment
*3 – 5 years of managerial experience
*Multiple and cross-function senior experiences are preferred in human resource management, site service, and general administration management.

Skills

To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

• Communicative and advisory skills
• Result-driven & problem solving (tool & skill)
• Strategic mindset & vision (long term planning)
• Stakeholders management (establishing effective networks)
• Creative & Innovation & accountability
• Judgement and informed decision

Diversity & Inclusion

job_name: CS - EXE HiNA Safety Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00264289-189
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Secure work safety during operation at customer site.  Be a contact window for ASML WW EHS & customer for safety relate topic.
As a new create position, we are looking for an safety engineer to drive and execute the tasks with enthusiastic.

Role and responsibilities
•Provide local hands-on safety support for EUV install, service and upgrade.
•To be the local contact and competence for EUV safety topics, questions and improvement
•Support local EUV local service management team and CS engineers by periodically review if all critical requirements for a safe way of working are in place (service mix, vessel entry, safety experts (H2, Electrical, Laser), trainings etc) and propose corrective/preventive actions if needed

•Support EHS specialist to follow-up EUV accidents, incidents and near misses in case structural solutions are needed, create AIR (ASML Issue Resolution) ticket for follow up.  
•Safety Inspection during for EUV high risk operation
•Prepare safety supervision tasks in the fab teams which include PTW/SRB preparation
•Prepare for EUV Ramp (volume installation and service activity). Provide support to deploy all safety requirements needed for a safe EUV ramp.
•Drive and Monitor HC EUV safety KPI (include manager, FSE, TSE)
•Monitor and process each teams safety capability (i.e: H2 training, QEW qualification…etc) to meet service operation requirements
•Work with customer safety department to review and ensure hardware change or upgrade will meet safety requirement and follow customer safety rule (SMOC)
•Facilitates the safety escalation process: Chair and coordinate the local SRB (safety review board) meetings, and Escalate to CS worldwide SRB (if needed).
•Support CS management to ensure a safe way of working in the region at customer locations. This includes also all other ASML activities at the customer site like PM, trouble shooting, installation and upgrade projects.

Education and experience
MS degree in Occupational Safety and Health, Environmental Engineering, or comparable.

1+ years of occupational safety and health related work experience.
-or-
Customer support field experience

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

•Taiwan governmental Level A Labor Safety or Health Specialist certification is preferred.
•Good communication skills in both English and Chinese (verbal and written) – to report in internal and external meetings and to communicate to local employees and foreigner.
•Motivated, pro-active, self-driven and flexible.

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
1.Based in Hsinchu office
2.10% Travel is needed as task based, on site at customer location is upon requested.

job_name: D&E - Metrology Application Development Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00261740-691
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
ASML is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of lithography systems that help enable Moore’s Law and the creation of increasingly powerful and capable electronic devices. Our San Diego-based light source division, Cymer, is renowned for developing both deep ultraviolet (DUV) lithography light sources and next generation extreme ultraviolet (EUV) light sources. As the world’s leading semiconductor equipment manufacturer, ASML enables chipmakers to produce cheaper, speedier chips – and to produce them faster – thereby enabling all the technology you use today. The systems we produce integrate several large and sophisticated machines, themselves each a feat of engineering innovation, precision, and speed. Hermes Microvision, Inc. (HMI), an ASML company, is a leading supplier of advanced E-beam inspection and pattern verification systems used for advanced semiconductor devices. HMI has multiple years of e-beam application experience and leadership in semiconductor factories, focused on high resolution and voltage contrast imaging. As part of ASML, HMI will boost ASML’s holistic lithographic portfolio of (i) lithography exposure systems, (ii) computational lithography and (iii) metrology. Between these three cornerstones ASML offers application products for process window enhancement, control and detection. We are located in the heart of San Jose and growing! One Company, One Goal, Limitless Innovation. It's our people that make the difference. “This position requires access to controlled technology, as defined in the Export Administration Regulations (15 C.F.R. § 730, et seq.). Qualified candidates must be legally authorized to access such controlled technology prior to beginning work. Business demands may require ASML to proceed with applicants who are immediately eligible to access controlled technology.”

Role and responsibilities
ASML/HMI brings together the most creative minds in science and technology to develop lithography & metrology machines, as well as computational lithography & control software. HMI’s metrology development engineer is responsible for develope application by high resolution e-beam systems to provide monitor and control solution for advanced nodes in semi-conductor industries. 
Develop e-beam metrology applications on new technologies or novel platforms.
Design and implement new functionalities with adding value to HMI’s hardware portfolio.
Test new application functions to achieve metrology performance requirement on semiconductor process.
Document and transfer new applications to worldwide customer support team.
Engage with the customer on novel application products for new business opportunities. 
20% travel is required.

Education and experience
M.S. and above in Electrical Engineering, Physics, Material Science or Chemical Engineering.
1-5 years’ experience in related fields is a must, including IC manufacturing, semiconductor process technology, metrology or equivalent experience.
Hands-on experience on material analysis, SEM metrology or semi-conductor process is required.
Script level programming skills is plus, including Matlab, Python or C++
Data visualization tool is a plus(excel Marco/JMP/Spotfire.)

Skills
Communication skill: Able to communicate with counterparts efficiently on project work.
Team work: Good team player to drive product development with stakeholders. 


Other information
For this position, you will :
Be the bridge between customers and design engineers.
Provide the solution and approach customers’ target.
Knowledge transfer and support field service engineer.

job_name: CS - Field Application Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00266236-883
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction
Application engineer plays a unique role as technology enabler to support our customer continuously development in lithography of semiconductor industry

Job Mission
Application engineer supports ASML product in 3 phases:
Business development: translate customer requirement into potential business development
New product introduction: new platform insertion in customer R&D / Pilot Fab
High volume manufacturing: sustain installed base machine for on product performance issues

Job Description
• Help new product business development include bridging D&E idea and customer requirement/demand.
• Familiar with semiconductor litho-process, optical & metrology mechanism, able to do on product troubleshooting under time pressure
• Able to understand customer’s needs and clearly describe the issues that customer is facing to internal stakeholders
• Act as the owner of customer requests and follow through. (customer interfacing, data collection, 1st hand analysis, etc)
• Escalate/Communicate the issues to ASML experts in headquarter when needed without losing the ownership. Drive for progress and containment/solution
• Able work and coordinate across departments to ensure smooth troubleshooting process
• Able to present and report clearly during internal and external meetings.

Education
Master of Optical/Physical engineering, Material/Chemical science, Mechanical engineering

Experience
3 - 5 years in semiconductor industry, optical engineering

Personal skills
•Excellent English presentation and communication skills to interface internal (business development managers, project leaders, management) and external customers (mainly execution and mid to high management level).
•Troubleshooting skill, basic project management
•Basic programming skill (Matlab) will be plus

Context of the position
This position is based in Hsinchu, working together with leading edge semiconductor customer. To fulfill customer’s needs, Application engineer always looking for potential improvement beyond current machine spec with supporting from different department (D&E/marketing/equipment engineering). Application engineer is creating value by integration of multiple professional area.

Other information
High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.

job_name: Cymer - Field Service Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00250229-145
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction
Provides onsite field service support through the performance of installations, upgrades, repairs, and maintenance of complex capital equipment and systems.  Troubleshoots either to resolve issues directly or through referring advanced issues to technical support resources.  Acts as a customer service advocate, instructing customers in the operation and maintenance of the system.

Job Description
•Analyzes, diagnoses, and troubleshoots Cymer equipment problems via telephone or at customer site.
•Performs installation, repair, retrofits, upgrades and preventive maintenance on Cymer equipment installed at customer sites.
•Maintains and manages an assigned installation equipment base.  This includes providing primary support, forecasting, conducting customer support meetings, and ensuring regular communication with the customer.
•Assists customers in the receipt, installation, and testing of company equipment.
•Conducts equipment troubleshooting, analysis, and debugging in support of installation or operating activities.
•Provides service education to customer’s service and operations staff.
•Ensures that parts are available and as specified for service requirements.
•Maintains appropriate tools are on hand and as required.
•Travels as required for the purposes of performing service activities at customer sites or backfilling for other Cymer Field Service Engineers.
•Completes service, expense reports, and other administrative responsibilities in accordance with Cymer’s procedures and with supervisor’s approval.
•Uses company technical documentation and provides feedback for improvement.
•Performs other duties as assigned.

Education
Requires an Associate’s Degree with a technical emphasis and a minimum of four (4) year’s of field service engineering experience or a Bachelor’s Degree in a technical field with two (2) years of field service engineering experience.

Experience
•Minimum of one (1) year experience in optics, laser, and/or semiconductor manufacturing equipment experience is preferred.
•Laser and vacuum experience preferred.
•Has led one installation or significantly contributed to the successful installation of products at multiple sites.
•Requires experience using the following software packages: Excel, Word, PowerPoint, LabView, Internet Protocol, and Computer Networking.

Personal skills
•Good written and verbal communications skills.
•Ability to analyze data and report problems, to complete accurate, comprehensive service reports, and to communicate technical issues to other technical staff. 
•Ability to collect, translate, and analyze data and take action based on effectively report problems though written and/or graphical representation of data (detailed Post-Mortem Chronological Abstracts, trending analysis, failure statistics, etc.).
•Excellent customer service skills, with a solid foundation in and an understanding of the importance of relationship building.
•Intermediate level of technical knowledge of electronics.
•Ability to facilitate resolution of technical challenges.
•Ability to apply advanced knowledge of installation, maintenance/repair, and troubleshooting at both the module and system level, while seeking expertise of more senior field service engineers where required.
•Ability to read and analyze opto-mechanical and electronic schematics.
•Must be able to successfully meet customer site access requirements such as:  background checks, safety training, and cleanroom access (gowning and breathing apparatus).  
•Ability to travel via air and auto approximately 20% of the time. 
•For regions - oral and written English language skills preferred.

job_name: D&E - Senior Application Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00261879-310
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Optimization of lithography process and patterning strategy to help development of today’s process technology is important.  Prediction of future lithographic performances is applicable even before the next generation exposure tool is ready.  Both of the optimization and prediction require image and process simulations, which are the core competences of the job vacancy.   

Role and responsibilities
Suggest a preferable image solution for critical layers driven by foundry customers.
Evaluate critical layers that can be superiorly printed by high-NA in terms of image performances and cost.
Build and compare patterning process flows.

Optimization of lithographic image systems especially for EUV
Comparing different patterning process options
Assessment of various resolution enhancement technologies
Emulation of patterning processes

Education and experience
Master/PhD

5-10 years’ experience on lithographic modeling/simulation, OPC/computational lithography, optical programming, lithography-related process emulation

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Lithographic simulation with commercial tools such as Hyperlith, Prolith, S-Litho, Tachyon SMO
Scripting/programming language such as Matlab, python, C
Data analysis and statistics

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
Technology department center, TDC, is assigned to work with our customers’ RD departments locally to help process development related work.  TDC supports the customers on image optimization and simulation for future nodes, meanwhile TDC delivers customers’ future requirements to system engineering teams.  The job holder needs to own a communication skill not only among external customers but also internal customers.

Overseas business travels are needed to fulfill part of the job mission.  Frequent discussions are expected in the partner groups.

job_name: [TW Pipeline] CS - EUV Upgrade Engineer - Hsinchu/Tainan - req57957
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Within ASML the sector Customer Support (CS) is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations. One of the departments in this sector is CS EUV Upgrade. The CS EUV Upgrade team prepares and manages the CS part of the execution of system upgrade of ASML EUV machines at customer sites. These upgrades are done in close cooperation with EUV Factory  and associated parties/projects  in shift schedules at customer production environment over a period of 2-3 months.

Role and responsibilities
• Manage and execute complex field upgrades and activities, enabling the field teams to unlock the potential of ASML EUV products for our customers.

• Work safely and meet customers / ASML designated safety rules –regulations at all time
• As an ASML Upgrade Engineer you will be an ASML ambassador at customer sites across the globe. 
• Execute hardware for upgrade and perform system setup for complex upgrade packages, difficult field swaps and “bring to spec packages”. 
• Your “can-do, will-do” attitude will enable you - together with a team of ASML engineers - to overcome whatever obstacles get in your way.  
• Provide feedback to improve cycle time and performance, utilize the zero error repeat concept during upgrade preparations and executions, and perform post upgrade recovery and analysis. 
• You are expected to have a general knowledge of lithography machines.
• Troubleshoot and solve problems related to upgrade hardware installation in close cooperation with a generalist and coordinator.
• Maintain and improve personal upgrade skills and general engineering knowledge such that majority of the problem can be solved without escalation.
• This position will require international travel (up to 70%) to the field offices worldwide for upgrades implementation and support, and self-development training in the factory or other site. 

Education and experience
• Bachelors degree in Electrical Technology, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, Physics, and Computer Science. 

• Experience in a customer support department for high tech products. Photo-lithography, Electro-Mechanical or Ultra Clean Vacuum. 
• Engineers with 2-3 years ASML EUV or NXT systems metrology experience are preferred.
• Precondiction: Must be able to speak / read / write English language

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

• Open for cultural differences.
• Motivated, pro-active, self-driven and flexible. 
• Good technical skills, analytical skills, and hands-on skills. 
• Good documentation skills.
• Multitasker with the ability to work in different and difficult working environment. 
• Good team player who is committed to the success of ASML.
• Good customer skills. 

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
•Flexibility to travel to other countries including Taiwan, Korea, USA and Israel, with short notice (up to 70%) if needed, with uninterrupted periods up to 6-8 weeks in a row. 
•Candidates are expected to support the CS Upgrades for at least 2-3 years upon completion of training.

Business Forecast / MOR & RFF

•To optimize service business process between ASML and customers, end to end, from service delivery, data validation & integrity, quote, customer PR / PO, invoice, approval, monthly report, OSO).Objective to simplify nice-to-have and automating administrative tasks, reduce service to cash cycle time.Project scope may include cross-sector stakeholders, CS Customer Support, SCM Supply Chain Mgmt, Finance, SBI / Service Business Integration, OMD / Order Management Desk.

job_name: CS - DUV Customer Support Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00253511-561
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Within ASML the sector Customer Support (CS) is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations. 

Role and responsibilities
- The Customer Support Organization is responsible for the qualification, repair and maintenance of the ASML systems at the customer site and is responsible for the necessary transfer of know-how to the customer.
- The Customer Support Engineer (CSE), an ambassador for ASML, must be the first line of support for the repair and maintenance of the ASML Systems.
- The CSE will interface with the customers, peers, local 2nd line support and staff management to assure timely and accurate support.
- The CSE must be able to clearly communicate between key stakeholders of technical, organizational and operational stakeholders in relation to driving availability to their specific customer.
- Analyzes, diagnoses, and troubleshoots equipment problems via telephone or at customer site.
- Performs, repair, retrofits and preventive maintenance on equipment installed at customer sites.
- Regularly provides assistance, guidance, leadership, and technical assistance to junior or less experienced field service engineers; may serve as site leader for customer.
- Maintains and manages an assigned installation equipment base. This includes providing primary support, forecasting, conducting customer support meetings, and ensuring regular communication with the customer.
- Assists customers in the receipt, installation, and testing of company equipment.Confidential
- Conducts equipment troubleshooting, analysis, and debugging in support of installation or operating activities.
- Provides service education to customer’s service and operations staff.
- Ensures that parts are available and as specified for service requirements.
- Maintains appropriate tools are on hand and as required.
- Travels as required for the purposes of performing service activities at customer sites or backfilling for other Customer Service Engineers.
- Completes service, expense reports, and other administrative responsibilities in accordance with procedures and with supervisor’s approval.
- Uses company technical documentation and provides feedback for improvement.
- Performs other duties as assigned. 

Education and experience
BS/MS major in Mechanical, Electrical/ Electro-optical, Controlling Engineering, Physics or other related fields

- Fab experience in the Lithography area will be a plus
- Experience or knowledge of semiconductor manufacturing process is preferred

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

- Good communication skills and command of the English Language
- Must be a strong team player, supporting & analytical skill and good working habits

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.
major: 工程學科類
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等

job_name: CS - Regional Capacity Planner - Hsinchu - J-00264172-323
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
This role is mainly for Capacity Planning.

Role and responsibilities
Manage TAP (Target Annual Plan)/DGM (Decision Gate Meeting) process, be the bridge between local CS and Central Business planning.
Act as point of contact for various stakeholders such as Business Line Management, Central Business Planning (located in Europe), HR, and others
Collect forecast information from central planning (RFF) and/or scenarios from sales (LTFP)
Gather planning proposals from both field and central and prepare for the story line
Check outcome of RFF with targets on LTFP, cost average, hiring, efficiency targets, etc.
Prepare storyline (RFF/LTFP proposal and reasoning) for CS segment and BL reps and advise on CS footprint change scenarios
Align approved RFF(per segment/BL/Cost center) with Stakeholders and capture in tooling, communicate capability impact to central Planning.
Run the head count planning process for your scope, drive alignment with the stakeholders.
Conduct analysis to identify trends and inefficiencies.
Produce and maintain a Capacity Plan, assessing the impact of changes on the plan and on the performance of services and resources. Ensure that the plan is feasible and in line with the Sales and Financials for assuring the success of the company.
Link planning to actuals (both outcome as drivers) and use that information to steer decision making or continuous improvement.
Drive continuous improvement to increase data quality and efficiency in the organization/processes.
Ensure that norms and planning models reflect reality of the ASML TW sites.
Coordinate and maintain CS TW 3rd party resource planning with Field, Procurement and Finance.
Assess and work with CRE for office seating capacity for TW.
Other duties as assigned.

Education and experience
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in industrial engineering, business administration, finance, or a related field.
Minimum 5 years of relevant work experience (supply chain, financial/business/capacity planning) in related sector (e.g. high-tech, customer service).
Previous knowledge of ASML CS business a plus.
Must be able to read and interpret data.

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Can observe and respond to people and situations and interact with others encountered in the course of work.
Can learn and apply new information or skills.
Must be able to read and interpret data, information, and documents.
Strong customer focus and commitment to customer satisfaction through prioritization, quality, efficiency and professionalism.
Ability to complete assignments with attention to detail and high degree of accuracy.
Proven ability to perform effectively in a demanding environment with changing workloads and deadlines.
Result driven-demonstrate ownership and accountability.
Identifies bottlenecks and drives improvements.
Work independently or as part of a team and follow through on assignments with minimal supervision.
Demonstrate open, clear, concise and professional communication.
Ability to establish and maintain cooperative working relationships with manager, co-workers and customer.
Work according to a strict set of procedures within the provided timelines.

job_name: 軟體開發_資深PM/專案經理(新竹廠)R08
cust_name: 友達光電股份有限公司
job_detail:
友達以深厚的面板研發及製造經驗為基礎，及領先全球多項技術的創新為能量，啟動「雙軸轉型計畫」。計畫以升級顯示技術附加價值（Go Premium）和深化垂直市場應用（Go Vertical）為兩大軸心，來進行數位化轉型，整合軟體，硬體，雲端與服務平台，進軍場域經濟的多元市場，發展應用於育樂、零售、醫療、交通、製造等多面向智慧解決方案。歡迎對軟體開發有熱情、對各場域解決方案有想法的夥伴們，加入我們起飛的行列！

【工作任務】

1. 帶領5人以上之專案團隊進行軟體產品開發，以Agile或Hybrid方式執行專案管理，使用ClickUp專案管理工具並產生相關報表。
2. 進行專案可行性評估，撰寫評估報告，若為外部標案則需與團隊合作撰寫建議書。
3. 專案執行前撰寫專案計劃書，包含WBS與各階段目標，規劃相關資源運用與時程進度。
4. 進行內部跨單位協調，與外部合作夥伴溝通。
5. 主導專案流程與文件產出，確保工作流程與產品品質。

【工作條件】
1. 視專案需要，使用英文與客戶溝通。
2. 可配合國內短期工作異地辦公和出差。
3. 曾帶領過5人以上專案團隊，完整執行SSDLC完整軟體開發流程。
4. 熟悉Waterfall, Agile或Hybrid專案管理方法及專案管理工具，會使用ClickUp尤佳。 
5. 曾參與軟硬體產品整合開發案，具備商業模式概念及執行方法者尤佳。
6. 具備在智慧醫療、教育、娛樂、零售、製造、交通等相關場域產品開發經驗。 
7. 態度積極樂觀，善於提升團隊工作士氣。 
8. 具備 PMP, PMI-ACP, CSM 等管理相關證照者尤佳。
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通

job_name: 軟體開發_SA系統分析/軟體分析師(新竹廠)R08
cust_name: 友達光電股份有限公司
job_detail:
友達以深厚的面板研發及製造經驗為基礎，及領先全球多項技術的創新為能量，啟動「雙軸轉型計畫」。計畫以升級顯示技術附加價值（Go Premium）和深化垂直市場應用（Go Vertical）為兩大軸心，來進行數位化轉型，整合軟體，硬體，雲端與服務平台，進軍場域經濟的多元市場，發展應用於育樂、零售、醫療、交通、製造等多面向智慧解決方案。歡迎對軟硬體整合有熱情、對各場域解決方案有想法的夥伴們，加入我們起飛的行列！

【工作內容】
1. 進行需求訪談，撰寫中/英需求說明書(URS)。
2. 進行系統分析，設計系統架構，撰寫中/英需求規格書(SRS)。
3. 使用需求追溯表等工具管理需求。
4. 依據SRS撰寫測試計畫書(Test Plan)，檢視測試報告(Test Report)，協助排除功能性測試與非功能性測問題。
5. 與系統開發團隊對接，協助程式產出與功能確認。

【Specialize @】
1. UML and OOA
2. Design principles and design patterns
3. AIoT 系統架構設計
4.系統前端工程分析 (Vue/Angular/React)
5.系統後端工程分析 (Restful API/Web Service)
6.資料結構設計(SQL/NoSQL)
7.雲端服務架構設計 (Azure, AWS …)

【工作條件】
1.可獨立撰寫中/英版需求規格書SRS、系統設計規格書SDS。
2.可配合業務需要出差。
3.可使用英文與客戶溝通系統需求與系統規格。
4.頭腦清晰、業務理解分析能力強、語言表達能力強
5.具有良好對內/對外溝通能力
6.對場域充滿好奇心並主動學習，同時對於解決方案有想法
7.具有多元場域(育樂、零售、醫療、交通、製造)分析經驗佳

友達光電以集團資源優勢讓車用顯示器再升級，將先進顯示技術如Micro LED、AmLED導入智慧車艙，並透過智慧座艙系統整合服務，以智慧化的人機互動顯示器與獨特座艙設計，作為實現智慧交通車載服務的差異化，為駕駛及乘客提供沉浸式感官體驗，創造未來汽車智慧座艙，打造除了家庭與職場之外的優質第三生活空間。

job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Occupational health nurse should conduct to manage and promote employees’ health. As a new create position, we are looking for an occupational health nurse to manage and promote the tasks with enthusiastic.

Role and responsibilities
1. Identify legal requirements on occupational health.
2. Conduct to manage employees’ mental and physical health, including planning and executing health programs and manage health abnormal employees.

4. Plan first aiders for emergency response.
1. Conduct Health management
- Arrange annual health check for TW employees
- Review, analyze employee health exam report and identify high-risk group
- Provide one-on-one education to employee and continuous provide health management
- Prevent occupational health disease (following regulatory requirement, eg, ASML biannually workplace monitoring, special health exam for special operation and health management)
- Cooperate with company doctors.
- Review new hires’ pre-employment health exam report
- Closely co-work with ASML safety specialist to understand job hazards and prevent occupational disease from happening
2. Arrange Health promotion
- Arrange health promotion program, for examples: weight management program, group smoking cessation program.
- Arrange health promotion activities, for examples: physical fitness measurement, blood donation, health-field guest speech, oral cancer screening
- Issue monthly health newsletter to ASML TW employees
3. Plan for Emergency Response
- Arrange regular first aid training for identified company first aider (one element of Emergency Response)
- Propose emergency response actions, previous examples are: Covid, MERS response, Dengue fever prevention
- Provide immediate medical help or health consultation to TW employees or employees from other country

Education and experience
BS/MS degree in department of nursing.
1. At least 5 years of occupational health related work experience.
2. Experience with occupational health in high-tech company.

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

1. Nurse license of higher examination
2. Finished 52-hour professional nursing training for occupational health services (從事勞工健康服務之護理專業訓練課程)
3. Good written and spoken English with Didactical skills and Cultural awareness.
4. Motivated, pro-active, self-driven, and flexible.
5. Analytic, abstract thinking, good communication skills, initiative, independent, sharing knowledge, stress tolerance and teamwork.
6. A team player, communicate proactively, have a healthy business sense and are on top of new opportunities which add value to our core business.

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
1. As ASML Taiwan CS grows up, a new occupational health nurse is created for Hsinchu site.
2. The occupational health nurse will report to CS EHS Nurse lead .

job_name: CS - Senior Field Application Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00245990-597
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Application team is part of the Customer Support organization. Application engineer is responsible to demonstrate, optimize, and sustain ASML solutions to ensure customer on-product performance for current node, and more import, develop solution for next node together with D&E in headquarter. Application engineer also has many opportunity to work with account teams to identify business opportunities base on customer use cases.
If you are interested in leading a technical team in a dynamic customer environment, this is great opportunity for you

Role and responsibilities
As a Senior Application engineer, your mission is leading the technology development in Metrology by Optical or E-beam technology based on customer requirement for next generation. You need to work closely with R&D team in customer side and ASML D&E team, define the technical gap and leading the solution roadmap for n-1 / n-2 node. 

Senior engineer of Application Support team:
•Technology excellence - familiar with leading edge technique of optical metrology (YieldStar) or e-beam metrology, distribute the knowledge within Application community
•Engage with ASML D&E and customer R&D team to define the solution roadmap to drive semiconductor technology
•Adopt creative approach when facing challenge, be enthusiasm to explore the unknown area in new technology
•Leading critical escalation and be able to manage senior leaders
•Systematic thinking, be capable of cross section integration
•Business development support to identify improvement potentials of ASML products to benefit our customer.

Education and experience
Master diploma in physics, optical science/engineering, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering or materials science

•Experience of >4 years in the semiconductor equipment industry, or semiconductor manufacturing – lithography, metrology (Optical or E beam) , metrology mark design. Experience of >1 years project management is preferred

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

•Strong technical background, drive towards collaboration and solutions.
•Strong customer focus and commitment to customer satisfaction.
•Take ownership and accountability to achieve proper team output.
•Excellent written and spoken English skills

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
Apps Senior Engineer is under the Apps NTP (node transition project) team, key focus on helping customer on Node solution definition; supporting NTP customer engagements from competence level.
Stakeholders: PL, GL, senior Application Engineers and customer engineers, representatives of various product teams. Recognized by customer as a knowledgeable engineer.

Shape and drive solution incubators within Applications Projects as part of the node strategy in order to validate proposed solutions, including methodologies and tooling, in an agile way within the node timing requirements. Collaborate with the Technology Program and product teams across various projects and customers on feasibilities and applications' customizations, while maintaining a customer-centric view.

job_name: CS - HMI Competence Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00246714-398
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Hermes Microvision Inc. (HMI), an ASML company, has been committed to the research and development of the most advanced E-beam Inspection (EBI) tools and solutions for the leading semiconductor manufacturing fabs

ASML is a high-tech fast growing Dutch company head-quartered near Eindhoven with local offices at our customers worldwide (e.g. Intel, IBM, Samsung) As market leader in the semiconductor industry ASML designs and manufactures complex lithographic systems. The customer service division consists of local offices at every customer site and a team of experts to support these local teams when complex technical problems are encountered.

Role and responsibilities
The mission of CS SE Competency Engineer is to enable our service engineers in the field, to be successful in supporting our customers.
As an expert you will function as the technical interface between CS Local organizations and ASML/HMI Product team for the high-volume installed base. In this role you will be responsible for the completeness and the quality of all knowledge, tools and spare parts (=Service Mix) that are required to diagnose, repair and recover ASML ebeam systems installed in a customer fab.
You combine in-depth subsystem knowledge with field experience and the ability to consolidate this into worldwide best practices. Next to your CS field colleagues, you will interface with the Development & Engineering, Manufacturing and Supply Chain sectors.
Your awareness of the environment in which your field service colleagues perform maintenance, enables you to identify and solve gaps in our service mix and to deliver end-user feedback in improvement projects in all corresponding.
In the ASML product life cycle you will have the following responsibilities:
Perform in-depth analysis of structural issues of the high-volume installed base at our customer sites.
Identify structural improvements to the design of ASML products and estimate their impact on CS operation
Identify structural improvements to the Service Mix and implement them globally in CS
Handshake and validate Service Mix that is supplied with new products and functionalities by Development & Engineering while safeguarding the needs for Fab Teams to be able to execute maintenance independently of external support.
Transfer and maintain all relevant knowledge to the CS field engineers in the form of documentation, training and Knowledge Transfer.
The sector Customer Support (CS) is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations, as well as transferring all relevant knowledge and supporting the customer in the use of these systems in his production process. CS Central takes care that effective support of the customer by local offices is possible by providing knowledge, technical support and process support to the field offices.

Education and experience
Master degree in technical science (Physics, Mechatronics, Electronics, Chemistry, Aerospace Engineering, Process technology, etc.) or equivalent experience is desired.
Knowledge of ASML structural improvement process and project experiences on a specialized technical level is a preferred

Skills
Get things done” mentality
Pro-active attitude
Strong analytical skills
Interpersonal abilities (Can relate wellto others, both colleagues and customers)
Effective communicator in English (bothoral and written)
Customer-oriented
Team player
Stress resistant


Other information
Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML? Read our frequently asked questions.

【公司願景】
友達光電以集團資源優勢讓車用顯示器再升級，將先進顯示技術如Micro LED、AmLED導入智慧車艙，並透過智慧座艙系統整合服務，以智慧化的人機互動顯示器與獨特座艙設計，作為實現智慧交通車載服務的差異化，為駕駛及乘客提供沉浸式感官體驗，創造未來汽車智慧座艙，打造除了家庭與職場之外的優質第三生活空間。

我們期待對於能找到對於電動車產業有興趣，
並期待能在興盛的EV產業中，成為Tier1夥伴的你/妳，加入我們的團隊。

為達成現階段智慧座艙的目標，這份職務將有以下任務與條件：

【工作任務】
1.依照產品需求了解測試需求以及Mode評估。
2.案件進度安排及掌控。
3.執行EMC相關測試並現場排除問題。
4.儀器設備與系統測試與校正。
5.審查驗證報告。 

【工作挑戰】
1. 跨部門溝通：面對新產品驗證，會需要跨部門與RD團隊、PM與QA進行合作
2. 車用產業變化快速，對於外部知識學習有熱誠

【工作條件】
1.具EMC / RF / 車用EMC 認證經驗。
2.可獨立執行EMC測試。
3.EMC問題分析、排除能力。

job_name: [Taiwan Pipeline] CS - Field Application Engineer - Hsinchu - req30040
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
ASML 將於10~11月舉辦各校秋季招募，歡迎應屆畢業生投遞應徵。
11/5 前投遞履歷，合適者約2周內會有專人與你聯絡，面試將安排在11/15-11/19 

說明會場次： 【10/6 清華大學】 【10/7 中山大學】 【10/12 中央大學】【10/13 陽明交通大學】 【10/20 中正大學】 【10/21 台灣科技大學】【10/23 成功大學】【11/3 台北科技大學】 【11/4 中興大學】 【11/10 逢甲大學】【11/25 高雄科技大學】

Introduction
Application engineer plays a unique role as technology enabler to support our customer continuously development in lithography of semiconductor industry

Job Mission
Application engineer supports ASML product in 3 phases:
Business development: translate customer requirement into potential business development
New product introduction: new platform insertion in customer R&D / Pilot Fab
High volume manufacturing: sustain installed base machine for on product performance issues

Job Description
• Help new product business development include bridging D&E idea and customer requirement/demand.
• Familiar with semiconductor litho-process, optical & metrology mechanism, able to do on product troubleshooting under time pressure
• Able to understand customer’s needs and clearly describe the issues that customer is facing to internal stakeholders
• Act as the owner of customer requests and follow through. (customer interfacing, data collection, 1st hand analysis, etc)
• Escalate/Communicate the issues to ASML experts in headquarter when needed without losing the ownership. Drive for progress and containment/solution
• Able work and coordinate across departments to ensure smooth troubleshooting process
• Able to present and report clearly during internal and external meetings.

Education
Master of Optical/Physical engineering, Material/Chemical science, Mechanical engineering

Experience
3 - 5 years in semiconductor industry, optical engineering

Personal skills
•Excellent English presentation and communication skills to interface internal (business development managers, project leaders, management) and external customers (mainly execution and mid to high management level).
•Troubleshooting skill, basic project management
•Basic programming skill (Matlab) will be plus

Context of the position
This position is based in Hsinchu, working together with leading edge semiconductor customer. To fulfill customer’s needs, Application engineer always looking for potential improvement beyond current machine spec with supporting from different department (D&E/marketing/equipment engineering). Application engineer is creating value by integration of multiple professional area.

Other information
High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.
