job_name: [ASML研發替代役/預聘] CS - DUV/EUV Upgrade, Install, Relocation Engineer - Linkou/Hsinchu/Taichung/Tainan - req53685
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction

Within ASML the sector Customer Support (CS) is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations. One of the departments in this sector is CS DUV/YS & EUV Install & Relo. The CS DUV/YS & EUV Install & Relo team prepares and manages the CS part of the execution of new system installation of new ASML machines at customer sites. These Installations are done in close cooperation with DUV/YS & EUV Factory System Install Engineering in shift schedules at customer production environment over a period of 1~3 months.
Job Mission
Install all types of lithographic DUV/YS & EUV systems in a continuously changing markets, on time with quality which exceeding customers’ expectation.

Job Description

- Work safely and meet customers / ASML designated safety rules –regulations at all time
- Install ASML DUV/YS & EUV equipment and execute within agreed cycle time and budget
- Evaluate and diagnose problems and make appropriate repairs
- Acquire sufficient knowledge of new and established products and processes
- Analytical Thinking | Provide the information to enable effective trouble shooting
- Helicopter-view | Anticipate on possible issues on the progress of the install
- Quality Control | Closing the Improvement loop regarding product quality & design •Ambassador role | represent ASML at the customer’s site in a professional way
- Communicative Skills | Handle customer matters & request in a professional way
- Knowledge sharing | Be the source for technical knowledge of new and existing products
- Clearly Reporting | Written technical reports on frequent base to various stakeholders within organization
- Awareness of usage of high cost tools, materials and equipment
- Work with co-workers (subcontractors, agents), customer & local field support , factory install engineers

Education

Bachelor (BSc) in an engineering or equivalent experience (Mechatronics, electronic) preferred additional knowledge: pneumatics, mechanics, and physics Experience
Experience
- Experience in a customer support department for high tech products. Photo-lithography, Electro-Mechanical or Ultra Clean Vacuum. 
- Engineers with 1-2 years ASML DUV/YS or NXT systems operational experience are preferred. 
- Precondition: Must be able to speak / read / write English language

Personal skills

- Analytical thinking 
- Structured 
- Processing large amounts of information 
- Service orientated 
- Good communicator 
- Team worker
- Operating independently 
- Assertiveness •Business sense 
- Flexible 
- Cultural awareness 
- Pro-activeness

Other information

- Expect to spend more than 90% of the time inside the clean room. 
- Willing to travel to customers worldwide.
- Candidates are expected to support the DUV/YS & EUV install for at least 3 years upon completion of training

job_name: CS - EUV Technical Leader (Metro & Sensor) - Hsinchu - J-00248512-446
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
As a Technical leader, your main task is to lead beta test qualifications and roll out new EUV technologies. You will work closely with Central CS NPI teams in Veldhoven, Wilton or San Diego depending on the topics you are in charge of.

In order to prepare ourselves as Taiwan CS are ready for the upcoming challenges on 3800E and EXE5000, Technical Leaders will spend quite an amount of time engaging these new platforms.

Other than that, you will be working on technical assessment for EUV functionality and install base industrialization, and connecting with stakeholders across different sectors (D&E, CS, BL) to provide clear problem descriptions and drive for solution roadmap.

Role and responsibilities
Majority of your time as a Technical Leader will be spent on:
New EUV technology roll-out: working with CS NPI teams to prepare for beta test and functional qualification. Help secure the new function is executable for local CS, and provide feedback or improvement proposal from local CS to Central teams.
Engagement on new EUV platforms, e.g., 3800E, EXE5000, etc. Activities including: travelling to Veldhoven, Wilton or San Diego (depending on the topics you are working on) and joining critical design qualification and integration.
Connecting with stakeholders across different sectors (D&E, local CS, Business Line) to provide technical assessment on new technology, and driving solution roadmap for critical issues.

Education and experience
Master / 3-7 years

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

What
- Specializing system-level skills on install base and NPI platforms
- Integrating technical roadmap to fulfill business/customer requirements
- Accountable for end to end result
- Leading internal/external stakeholders on technology agenda
- Coaching and guiding engineers to enhance technical capabilities
How
- English and presentation comprehensive
- Effectively influencing stakeholders
- Building up partnership with D&E and driving on actions
- Systematic Thinking and Data driven
- Self-motivated
- show passion technology development and creative on approach

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

job_name: CS - HMI Global Support Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00258194-097
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Do you look forward to challenging complex problems and driving the cutting-edge technology by collaborating with brilliant minds around the globe? If this is calling you, then you might be the right candidate for GSC (Global Support Center).

As a GSC team member, we create values to customers by providing technical support to solve issues of E-beam inspection machines, as well as identifying and reporting structural issues to initiate continuous improvements. We also contribute to push the boundary of technology by supporting introduction of new products and transition to production. GSC is also good team players through collaboration with various stakeholders. 

Role and responsibilities
(Remote / onsite) act as 3rd line technical support team, Global Support Center (GSC), to handle worldwide escalation issues of E-beam machines
(Remote / onsite) coordinate escalation process with related stakeholders to drive for timely and structural diagnostics
Contribute to quality technical documents including service procedures, escalation issue reports, and BKM
Collaborate with related stakeholders to take improvement measures as a post action of escalation diagnostics
Collaborate with related stakeholders to support NPI projects
Lead / support CS technical projects
Transfer knowledge within GSC / to CS through presentation session to help team skill up

Education and experience
You hold master degree in mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, physics or material science.

You possess either of the following both:
2 years in Secondary Electron Microscope operation (SEM), having knowledge of electron optics, experience of SEM repairment is highly preferred; or
2 years in motion control of wafer stage, having knowledge of mechanics / motion control of  wafer stage.
Having experience in technical support of semiconductor equipment is a plus, E-beam inspection or metrology tool is even preferred

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Team spirit and good interpersonal relating and communication skill, even under stressful situation
Awareness of stakeholder management when interfacing with internal / external stakeholders
Willing to challenge and deal with complex technical matters, even when time is limited
Willing to support shift pattern(Day shift) in order to mate team resource allocation

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
Performance will be recognized based on result, not any other factor absolutely
Fast growth is guaranteed if your performance & capability is ready for suitable position

job_name: 軟體開發企劃/資訊架構師(IA)(新竹廠)R08
cust_name: 友達光電股份有限公司
job_detail:
友達以深厚的面板研發及製造經驗為基礎，及領先全球多項技術的創新為能量，
啟動「雙軸轉型計畫」。計畫以升級顯示技術附加價值（Go Premium）和深化垂直市場應用（Go Vertical）為兩大軸心，來進行數位化轉型，整合軟體，硬體，雲端與服務平台，進軍場域經濟的多元市場，發展應用於育樂、零售、醫療、交通、製造等多面向智慧解決方案。

歡迎對軟硬體整合有熱情、對各場域解決方案有想法的夥伴們，加入我們!

【工作內容】
1. 與PM/SA合作，一同接洽客戶並進行需求訪談，運用Figma製作系統雛形(wireframe)。
2. 利用系統雛型和分析文件，向用戶確認可用性測試的結果。
3. 依據不同使用者、情境、內容提出產品規劃，撰寫產品企劃簡報。
4. 依據不同提案需求，撰寫中/英文產品企劃提案(Proposal)。
5. 與設計體驗部門對接，協助UI產出與雛型確認。
6. 能使用英文與客戶溝通。
7. 可配合短期工作異地辦公和出差(國內)。

【工作條件】
1. 曾參與5人以上專案團隊，完整執行SSDLC完整軟體開發流程。 
2. 可撰寫中/英文產品企劃提案(Proposal)，包含網站、app、產品、系統服務等。
3. 熟悉Axure, Figma等雛型工具，規劃系統流程與介面雛形(wireframe)。
4. 能和用戶確認可用性測試的結果，以確定他們創建的結構是否適合他們的用戶
5. 優秀的溝通技能（書面和口頭）與分析能力
6. 具備在智慧醫療、教育、娛樂、製造、交通等場域產品開發經驗佳。
7. 曾參與1,000萬規模以上軟體產品開發案，有軟硬體整合案例尤佳。
8. 勤奮、有創造力、對人和新的想法充滿好奇心

#軟體企劃
#Architect
#Planner

job_name: [Taiwan Pipeline] CS - EUV Customer Support Engineer - Hsinchu - req41855
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Within ASML the sector Customer Support (CS) is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations.

Role and responsibilities
- The Customer Support Organization is responsible for the qualification, repair and maintenance of the ASML systems at the customer site and is responsible for the necessary transfer of know-how to the customer.
- The Customer Support Engineer (CSE), an ambassador for ASML, must be the first line of support for the repair and maintenance of the ASML Systems.
- The CSE will interface with the customers, peers, local 2nd line support and staff management to assure timely and accurate support.
- The CSE must be able to clearly communicate between key stakeholders of technical, organizational and operational stakeholders in relation to driving availability to their specific customer.

- Analyzes, diagnoses, and troubleshoots equipment problems via telephone or at customer site.
- Performs, repair, retrofits and preventive maintenance on equipment installed at customer sites.
- Regularly provides assistance, guidance, leadership, and technical assistance to junior or less experienced field service engineers; may serve as site leader for customer.
- Maintains and manages an assigned installation equipment base. This includes providing primary support, forecasting, conducting customer support meetings, and ensuring regular communication with the customer.
- Assists customers in the receipt, installation, and testing of company equipment.Confidential
- Conducts equipment troubleshooting, analysis, and debugging in support of installation or operating activities.
- Provides service education to customer’s service and operations staff.
- Ensures that parts are available and as specified for service requirements.
- Maintains appropriate tools are on hand and as required.
- Travels as required for the purposes of performing service activities at customer sites or backfilling for other Customer Service Engineers.
- Completes service, expense reports, and other administrative responsibilities in accordance with procedures and with supervisor’s approval.
- Uses company technical documentation and provides feedback for improvement.
- Performs other duties as assigned.

Education and experience
BS/MS major in Mechanical, Electrical/ Electro-optical, Controlling Engineering, Physics or other related fields
Experience
- Fab experience in the Lithography area will be a plus
- Experience or knowledge of semiconductor manufacturing process is preferred

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

- Good communication skills and command of the English Language
- Must be a strong team player, supporting & analytical skill and good working habits

job_name: D&E - Software Design Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00263106-243
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
We are expanding to support our business on application software develop for ASML/HMI defect inspection Result, CD metrology result presentation and Scanner data integrate analysis. We are looking for a team player with experience developing high-performance applications for large scale software. This developer is decisive, action-oriented, learns quickly, independently, and takes ownership of open issues.

Role and responsibilities
As a senior Software Designer you will join our team as a key role to contribute to one of the core functions of our application and to work.
You are happy to collaborate with users on the design of the functionality you work on and on how they would like the system to work.
You are motivated to collaborate with other function group to align on the overall system design for the application software.
You are capable of understanding and explaining complex challenges and you can guide your colleagues in the implementation of the smaller parts that you identified.
You take pride in writing clean, high quality and maintainable OO code, mainly in .Net/C#, and familiar with web service/APIs.

Develop software applications for the HMI eBeam tools and other holistic lithography solutions for ASML products.
Translate business requirements into software solutions and continuously improve the software to meet customer’s needs.
Design, implement, test, deliver and document software system mainly written in C#/C++.
Drive and align on technical direction with all to assure impact of software changes is properly documented, reviewed and accepted by all stakeholders.
Review and assure quality on software deliverables (design, code, test, document, etc.) throughout the software lifecycle.
Take ownership for product realization by providing high quality designs, product documentation and software implementation.

Education and experience
A relevant BSc or MSc in the area of software engineering, computer science, information systems, IT or related subject on software development.

MS with 0~8+ years or BS with 0~10+ years hands-on experience in software development. At least 2~5+ year experience with C#.
Hands-on experience on the .NET platform application with WinForm, WPF, Web develop .
Experience on software product development lifecycles, using UML, OOP, design patterns and best practices.

Skills
You should first of all be passionate about technology and should be excited by the idea that your work will impact the most advantage technology in the world.
You should be analytical, product and quality-oriented. You like to investigate issues, you are creative in solving problems.
You are open-minded, you like to discuss about design challenges and you want to push the boundaries of technology to design enticing applications.

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
This position is available in Application Software Develop (ASD) group under “HMI/DE/Software Engineering” department. The mission of ASD is to develop application software for HMI Inspection/Metrology tools result presentation and data analysis. We also corporate with Brion to develop application software to integrated ASML/HMI/Brion products.

job_name: CS - Material Quality Project Leader - Hsinchu - J-00253335-788
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
In the highly innovative environment of Semiconductor Industry ASML customers are strongly driving the need high quality products. As a Taiwan Material Quality Team member you are supporting the Customer Support quality roadmap and secure Taiwan CS focus on quality in order to meet and exceed customer satisfaction. 

Role and responsibilities
As a MQT member, you will lead the deployment and execution of the quality roadmap for Taiwan CS. Responsible for improving or redesigning material handling process in CS to achieve the ASML Zero DOA ambition, drive a Quality mindset and reduce ASML cost. 

1. Execute and leads DOA, defect material intake and RCA reporting. 
2. collect facts and figures and crate business for improvement 
3. Drive the material process quality within the CS organization to improve profitability. 
4. Lead and Execute material-related quality project for Taiwan CS 
5. Deploy the quality behavioral vision and develop quality knowledge/awareness in CS.

Education and experience
Master or Bachelor degree in Quality Management, Engineering or Science 

1. 2 year field experience in Customer Support ASML 
2. Good knowledge of quality management tools: 8D report, RCA, problem solving 
3. Technical knowledge of DUV/YS is preferred 
4. Project management skills are preferred 

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

1. High focus on quality values 
2. Problem Analysis skills 
3. Good communication skills, good listener, with the ability to engage with team 
4. Zero repeat quality mindset (first time right) 
5. Pro-active attitude and taking initiative 
6. Team player, but also independent. 
7. Leadership attitude 
8. Change management 
9. Flexible and able to work in changing environments

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

歡迎對軟體開發有熱情並勇於挑戰的你加入我們，一同透過軟體技術與服務整合，在不同場域的解決方案中，實現以人為核心的顯示器無所不在曼妙生活。
我們期待在了解公司Go Vertical場域應用的產品及商業需求，夥伴能與軟體企劃及UX/UX同仁合作進行相關軟體服務之開發設計與維護，因此前端工程師將有以下工作：

1. 與UIUX設計師、後端工程師合作，串接後端服務並開發前端頁面與互動效果。
2. 運用前端技術開發可跨平台呈現、運行的頁面與功能模組
3.致力於開發並持續優化高可用、高效能與高安全的系統與服務。
4.新技術、工具或應用的研究與導入評估。
5.架構分析與技術文件撰寫，共同累積團隊技術資產。
6.與團隊一同Review、建立並持續改善整體設計架構與程式撰寫指南。

【技能與經驗條件】
1. 熟悉HTML5、CSS3、ES6與Vue、React等前端框架(必要)
2. 具後端服務整合與互動內容開發經驗
3. 具備網路安全知識、了解軟體安全開發觀念。
4. 熟悉使用UML
5. 熟悉Git, Gitflow/ Azure AWS

【加分要件】
1. 具3D、圖表、Dashboard等相關元件整合經驗佳。
2. 有高併發或C10K問題解決經驗佳。
3. 懂容器化相關知識，有Docker、k8S使用經驗佳。

cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction and responsibilities
Each year, 8 of the best first-year master’s degree students in science, engineering and business are selected to receive the ASML Elite Scholarship in Taiwan. Recipients get financial support and learning opportunities to grow their professional knowledge and personal skills. The scholarship encourages students in Taiwan to be innovative, tackle challenges and keep learning. What’s in it for you? The ASML Elite Scholarship will provide each awarded student with:  

Financial support of NT$150,000 per year for each of the two years of the full-time master’s degree study.  
A personal ASML mentor: an ASML expert who shares his/her technical knowledge and personal experiences with you, who introduces you to ASML activities and specialists and who guides you in your personal development.  
Online English courses. 
A summer internship at ASML (mandatory, 8 weeks from July till August).
   
Do you fit?
We’re looking for students whose undergraduate performance meets at least one of the following criteria:  

GPA 3.7/4.0 
GPA 4.0/4.3 
85 average grade score 
Ranking within 15% in the department  

In addition, you currently study:  

Science and engineering 
Aerospace engineering 
Computer science or software/information engineering 
Electrical engineering 
Industrial engineering 
Materials science 
(Applied) Mathematics 
Machinery 
Mechanical engineering 
Nanotechnology, nanoscience or nanomaterials 
Optoelectronics 
(Applied) Physics 

Business management  
Human resources 
Accounting 
Financial management 
Business management (or related to technology management) 

Elite Scholarship application process
1.Apply : Applications open to 2022/10/31. You’ll need to complete the online application and submit required materials (including a resume, transcript and study plan). After application, you will receive the video interview link if you fit the criteria. 

2.First selection round : We make selections based on academic performance, extracurricular activities, and your video interview. We’ll let you know by email if you’re selected to proceed to the second round. 

3.Selection days : In this second round, you will participate in the Master Class and have an English-language interview with the selection board at the Hsinchu office in November or December, 2022.  

4.Scholarship offer : We’ll let you know by email or phone if you’ve been selected to receive the ASML Elite Scholarship before February, 2023.

Do you have questions? For questions about the scholarships, please refer to our FAQ below. For further information, please contact asml.taiwan.careers@asml.com  


Other information
1.May I apply for the Elite Scholarship in advance, such as during my bachelor’s degree? 
Yes, the scholarship program is open to new master’s degree students, including students who started their program earlier the same year.  

2.May I apply for the Elite Scholarship program if I am not a Taiwanese student? 
Yes, the scholarship program is open to all the students who study in Taiwan’s universities. You have to provide enrolled certification as well. 

3.May I apply for the Elite Scholarship program if I am pursuing my master’s degree overseas? 
No. Unfortunately, to encourage talents in Taiwan, ASML Taiwan Scholarship currently only offers to students study in Taiwan. 

4.Video interview
After completing application, the first selection stage is an online, pre-recorded interview. If you are selected, you will be invited to record your answers to a few pre-determined questions via the tool HireVue. 

5.Is the summer internship mandatory? 
Yes, you must complete the summer internship. You will also be assigned as a ASML campus ambassador to support campus recruitment activities.  Summer Internship will need your fully commit to 8 weeks from July till August; one year internship is also welcome.

Our target is to support Asian countries’ time tracking application, which means all the topics or issues relevant to time tracking application are our service scope.

Service Order Quality

Handle SO issue, correction, trouble-shooting; feedback on structural issues and indicate correct solution owner.
Shape & Drive at external
Drive CS manager on controlling indices such as time writing (pending hours, weekly 60hr violation, monthly OT 46hr violation), Utilization Rate, old Open Service Order (>90days), etc.
Drive CS engineer on time writing timely release, frequent errors and SO incorrect booking reduction, and other agreed scopes.
Drive Account Team on lead time of signing or renewing commercial contracts, OSO definition (billable or not) and DST agreement and prep, and other agreed scopes.

job_name: CS - EUV Upgrade Technical Coordinator - Hsinchu - J-00252595-392
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction
Within ASML the Customer Support (CS) group is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations. One of the departments in this group is EUV Upgrade. The organization prepares and executes complex EUV upgrades action over ASML EUV systems at various customer worldwide.

Job Mission
Manage and keep leading on complex upgrade sequence and activities, enabling successful upgrade with quality within all sorts of resource budgets,  unlock the potential of ASML EUV products for our customers.

Job Description
- Work safely and meet customers / ASML designated safety rules –regulations at all time
- As Coordinator you will be an ASML ambassador at customer sites across the globe.
- Run upon shift model, based on BP design and install coordination needs.
- Work with the local and Veldhoven organizations to plan and make all necessary preparations for the on-time execution of the upgrade.
- Ensure timely availability of the right procedures and recoveries to bring the machine on the best performance level.
- Onsite coordination of the install including: manpower scheduling, parts, upgrade sequence preparation and tooling.
- Deal with fast changing circumstances and change plans accordingly on the spot.
- Assist EF/D&E coordinators by facilitating their issues while in Taiwan.
- Identify, document and drive improvements in order to reduce upgrade cycle time.
- Daily reporting or tracking of upgrade progress and issues.
- Support upgrade PL to facilitate upgrade requirement tasks and follow up
- This position will require international travel (up to 10%) to the field offices worldwide for EUV upgrade.

Education
Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Technology, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, Physics, and Computer Science. 

Experience
- Experience in a customer support department for high tech products. Photo-lithography, Electro-Mechanical or Ultra Clean Vacuum.
- Engineers with 2-3 years ASML EUV or NXT `hands-on’ experience is preferred.

Personal skills
- Open for cultural differences.
- Motivated, pro-active, self-driven and flexible.
- Highly stress-resistant.
- Take the lead during escalations and drive for solutions.
- Self-sustaining and ability to prioritize activities and coordinate a broad range of specialists, ensuring action plans are carried out.
- Analytical ability.
- Good documentation skills.
- Multitasker with the ability to work in different and difficult working environment.
- Good team player who is committed to the success of ASML.
- Good customer skills.
- Good communication skills, verbal and written, in English.

Other information
- Flexibility to travel to other countries including Taiwan, Korea, USA, (up to 10%) if needed, with uninterrupted periods up to 6 weeks in a row.
- Candidates are expected to support the upgrade for at least 2-3 years upon completion of training.
- This position may require “on call” duty depending on location or assignment

job_name: CS - DUV Customer Support Engineer - Hsinchu - J-00245387-896
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Within ASML the sector Customer Support (CS) is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations. 

Role and responsibilities
- The Customer Support Organization is responsible for the qualification, repair and maintenance of the ASML systems at the customer site and is responsible for the necessary transfer of know-how to the customer.
- The Customer Support Engineer (CSE), an ambassador for ASML, must be the first line of support for the repair and maintenance of the ASML Systems.
- The CSE will interface with the customers, peers, local 2nd line support and staff management to assure timely and accurate support.
- The CSE must be able to clearly communicate between key stakeholders of technical, organizational and operational stakeholders in relation to driving availability to their specific customer.
- Analyzes, diagnoses, and troubleshoots equipment problems via telephone or at customer site.
- Performs, repair, retrofits and preventive maintenance on equipment installed at customer sites.
- Regularly provides assistance, guidance, leadership, and technical assistance to junior or less experienced field service engineers; may serve as site leader for customer.
- Maintains and manages an assigned installation equipment base. This includes providing primary support, forecasting, conducting customer support meetings, and ensuring regular communication with the customer.
- Assists customers in the receipt, installation, and testing of company equipment.Confidential
- Conducts equipment troubleshooting, analysis, and debugging in support of installation or operating activities.
- Provides service education to customer’s service and operations staff.
- Ensures that parts are available and as specified for service requirements.
- Maintains appropriate tools are on hand and as required.
- Travels as required for the purposes of performing service activities at customer sites or backfilling for other Customer Service Engineers.
- Completes service, expense reports, and other administrative responsibilities in accordance with procedures and with supervisor’s approval.
- Uses company technical documentation and provides feedback for improvement.
- Performs other duties as assigned. 

Education and experience
BS/MS major in Mechanical, Electrical/ Electro-optical, Controlling Engineering, Physics or other related fields

job_name: CS - HMI NPI Project Leader - Hsinchu - J-00260582-547
cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Do you excel in managing and motivating others in technical challenging and complex projects? Do you enjoy networking and sharing your vision on how to continually improve our systems? Do you get a ‘kick’ out of making others successful? If so, a career as ASML Project Leader in Customer Support awaits you.

Your ultimate mission as a Customer Support Project Leader is to prevent ASML CS engineers from flying out to customer sites across the globe and drive local self-sufficiency to sustain local CS operational tasks. You will approach this mission from three directions: firstly, by ensuring meticulous pre-shipment preparation of all new systems and products. Secondly, by ensuring that the several hundred local ASML Engineers are fully trained and motivated. And thirdly, by ensuring that all possible design improvements identified in the field are accurately fed back to the Development and Engineering (D&E) organization. This will help realize more reliable and serviceable designs. It is, of course, an almost impossible mission (to ultimately make it unnecessary to fly out engineers to customer sites), but it is one that we think may appeal to your sense of adventure.

Role and responsibilities
As a CSPL you will prepare the field for a smooth introduction of some of the most complex machines ever built – the latest e-beam systems and products from ASML-HMI. But of course you won’t be alone, you will develop and grow with a project team of up to 10 project leaders and start up engineers allocating in the worldwide ASML offices. You will also have local ASML engineering support in all world regions and access to knowledge about the latest ASML technologies. Your activities can broadly be divided into two types: pro-active preparation of the field before the roll-out of new systems, and re-active trouble-shooting after. And, because we will expect you to feedback your knowledge of how our systems perform in the field, you will be the link between real-life in the field and our Design and Engineering activities.

The on-time delivery of the required spare parts and tools (up to 1000s), procedures (up to 100s), training and diagnostics, required to support the system
Drive a large D&E (Development and Engineering) organization (10 to 30 separate projects per new product) towards a reliable and serviceable system design
Develop and roll out the means & methods for rapid diagnosis and repair of system problems
Build and train a global CS organization consisting of 100s of BSc engineers
Feedback knowledge to D&E to ensure system design improvement
Manage the Reliability, Down Time Reduction and Preventive Maintenance improvement programs within CS
Manage complete roll-out plan.

Education and experience
Master’s degree (or Bachelor + relevant experience) in physics, electronics or mechanical engineering.

Extensive project management experience (3-5 years) in a high-tech equipment industry. Preferably experience in the area of reliability engineering and service execution/engineering.

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

The ability to influence without power
Structured, complete and multicultural communication
Capable of conceiving and maintaining ‘global’ overview
Expert planning capabilities.

Within ASML the Customer Support (CS) group is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations.

Role and responsibilities
The role of the Sequence Integrator is to independently plan, prep, verify, merge and execute service actions sequences into the most efficient and effective method/sequence.
The role encompasses the preparation of the sequences collected from ARE and Coach databases. This person has a continuous improvement mindset and will communicate internally within the OPP team. Provide insights for the scheduling in relation to the sequences.
They are in frequent communication with the central sequence integration team.
Able to travel oversea to receive training and engagement.

Education and experience
Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Technology, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, Physics, and Computer Science.
Engineers above 3 years ASML EUV is preferred.

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

Motivated, pro-active, self-driven and flexible. Highly stress-resistant.. Analytical ability. Good documentation skills. Multitasker with the ability to work in different and difficult working environment. Good team player who is committed to the success of ASML. Good communication skills, verbal and written, in English.
Planning and prioritization
Motivated to learn and take ownership in the sequence tooling
Take part in projects that help us in achieving our goals

job_name: 《新竹市-視訊面試》Samsung專賣店-銷售專員【前六個月保障薪獎3萬3千元】

job_detail:
我們的願景：成為最受客戶信賴的3C精品品牌

工作內容：
1. 門市日常營運，銷售Samsung 全系列產品、副廠產品及公司主推產品，以利業績達成。
2. 產品諮詢及專業建議、售後服務與產品保固、裝置保險等…介紹。
3. 確保門市賣場的產品安全性與環境清潔度，符合原廠稽核規範。
4. 商品上架、陳列、盤點、收銀、換貨、改裝、開幕
5. 秉持卓越的服務精神，用心款待每一位顧客。
6. 配合公司商圈規劃進行分發與輪調歷練。
7. 主管交辦事項、門市行政工作。

工作優勢：
1. 前六個月保障薪獎3萬3千元起 (完整給予六個足月)。
2. 前三個月新人業績目標減免 (新人可充分學習與培訓)。
3. 位於新竹知名熱鬧商場、交通便捷、人流量高(業績有保障)。
4. 每年萬元福利，完整照顧每位員工 (長期任職沒煩惱)。

出勤制度：
早班 11:00AM、晚班 13:00PM、每班8小時(不含用餐1小時)。
每月休假依當月週六、週日天數及國定假日天數排休(8-11天不等，例2022十月排休11天)。

福利制度：
1. 員工團體保險
2. 員工結婚津貼
3. 員工生育津貼
4. 員工通話費補助
5. 員工購物折扣
6. 展示機優先認購
7. 年度績效獎金
8. 節日激勵獎金(每年兩次)
9. Samsung原廠課程專業培訓
10. 在職人員健康檢查
11. 2021年因疫情致百貨停業清消，每人每月多給8天有薪隔離假
12. 2021疫情期間加碼員工防疫險，2022加碼防疫險補助

福委會制度：
1. 三節禮金
2. 每年舉辦團康活動
3. 門市聚會補助(唱歌、聚餐、出遊)
4. 員工旅遊補助(自由行、跟團、票券)
5. 春酒獎項贊助

歡迎具有電信業門市經驗、3C產品銷售門市、店鋪營運管理經驗者，薪資待遇另議。

【前六個月保障本薪+業績獎金3萬3千元起，依當月業績獎金辦法與達成狀況，擇高發放！】

To ensure timely roll out of projects and program to the regions. Ensuring the projects roll out meets the future business needs of  ASML. Using benefit management, stakeholder engagement, risk management and communication management to ensure progress are well on track.  We drive  long term Operations strategy making and execution from current to target states via programs and by focusing on people.
The Job mission focus on the following related attributes:
• Enabling future Ops performance by Ops participating in Product design phase, implementation  & execution of deployment and providing timely feedback for CIP
• Shaping Operations footprint & capabilities
• Organize structural improvement to raise the performance of ASML production system and leverage the global network 

Role and responsibilities
Strategy and policy contribution
• Support the overall n-PGP strategy for Regional Engagement.  Translate the Global Engagement strategy to a regional specific strategy (e.g. multi-local, multi country level) & lead execution of the strategy-based regional plan.
•Develop a way of working and process for the region and breakdown into site specific engagement that can support the realization of objectives
Advice and analysis at minimum impact operationally
•Support cross country balancing and aligning, and trigger cross-country support if necessary
•Consolidate local feedback into regional feedback and advice per VoC (country) for OPS Portfolio Balancing (road-mapping)
Instruments, guidelines and procedures
•Counter-part with Regional Engagement Team & CS Central team to develop and address on way of working, deployment and planning for strong partnership
Management Information
•Report, share and evaluate activities on a regional (cross site)level by means of periodical and ad hoc reports / analysis to enable information transparency at Regional level of stakeholders
• Address and report status/risk/insights on defined scope at regional level in order to enable Key Stakeholders to make decision and determine or adjust strategy
Implementation
•Support sustaining solutions are being implemented and safeguards local benefits and standardization
•Balancing local change absorption capacity and smoothen deployment rhythm together with Program & Project teams

Relationship Management
•Build and maintain a sustainable and accessible network of OSE Stakeholders, Operations Stakeholders, Operations Field Stakeholders and partners to represent OSE on a Regional level

People Management
•Supervise work of the site with projects leads
•Influence without authority and engaging with site operational team for win-win.
•Manage large regional (and local) Stakeholder network and steer without formal mandate to obtain full commitment to set objectives

Education and experience
Master/Bachelor degree is preferred 
5 years of service within ASML  Customer Service organization. Job Grade 7 and above is preferred. 

Skills
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

• Assertive in negotiation with projects stakeholders and key appointment holders. Good communication skills.
• Coordinate cross sector programs & activities. Lead project and drive for result, Engage with site manager.
• Good in change management, stakeholder management & independent contributor



Other information
The Regional n-PGP project leader position is 100% dedicated to the Regional Customer Support Operations Support team  for Taiwan and Singapore. Strong partnership with Higher management, Project leaders and site managers, peers and regional  counterparts
Weekdays night conference calls and occasional weekend work due to  scenario studies preparation. ONE and not limited to just CS4CS program is part of nPGP environment and will be embedded under nPGP organization.   
Travel : 5% Overseas & 20% Domestic

【ASML實習生招募 – Legal Intern法務部門實習生】
想深入了解外商的工作文化、開啟你的國際視野、提前為進入職場做準備，並為你的履歷表加分嗎?
歡迎你加入全球最大半導體設備商ASML，成為我們的實習生，體驗開放、創新的工作文化!
總部位於荷蘭的ASML (台灣艾司摩爾) 是全球最大晶片微影設備市場的翹楚，為半導體製造商提供微影設備及相關服務，英特爾、三星和台積電等全球頂尖的半導體廠皆為ASML的客戶。ASML是一個國際化的企業，2020年的全球銷售額逾140億歐元，研發投資金額達22億歐元，佔當年度總營收的15.7%，ASML的業務快速成長，躍升為全球市值最大的半導體設備公司。30多年來，ASML透過和客戶及供應商的緊密合作，搭配上高效能的營運流程，以及來自全球的優秀員工，逐步開創了我們在晶片微影領域的技術領先地位，協助其設計研發及整合高階系統，開發可用於各類資訊科技產品、行動通訊及物聯網相關產品的晶片，簡單來說，您每天都在使用的電子產品都仰賴我們的設備與技術服務。

2.	開放創新的工作文化，扁平友善的公司組織

job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Within ASML the sector Customer Support (CS) is responsible for the maintenance, repair and continuous improvement of ASML systems at customer locations. One of the departments in this sector is CS NPI EUV. The CS NPI EUV team prepares and manages the CS part of the execution of new system maintenance of new ASML machines at customer sites.

•The Customer Support Organization is responsible for the qualification, repair and maintenance of the ASML systems at the customer site and is responsible for the necessary transfer of know-how to the customer.

•The System leader need to engage with internal/external customer to have smooth operation/execution

•The System Leader will interface with the customers, peers, local 2nd line support and staff management to assure timely and accurate support.

•The System leader must be able to clearly communicate between key stakeholders of technical, organizational and operational stakeholders in relation to driving availability to their specific customer.

Role and responsibilities
System leader will support planning manager to execute daily fab operation, and co-work with project team, planning team, CSCM, account team and tech support team to ensure the execution quality of machine schedule down and un-schedule down activities. Interface with customer to align expectation and priority. Your main responsibilities: •Identify and justify resource claims and recruit the right team members. •Set challenging targets and execute performance reviews. •Continuously mentor your team to success, improve underperformance and develop talents. •Coach and develop your team into fully operational engineers. •Prioritize and allocate team members to activities. •Drive continuous improvement in processes and way of working. •Create and execute department strategy on how to improve company processes. •Coordinating among customer, CSCM and planning team to secure progress of fab activities. •Interface with customer for planning, execution, and issues discussion.

Education and experience
BS/MS major in Mechanical, Electrical/ Electro-optical, Controlling Engineering, Physics or other related fields

•Engineers/Supervisors with greater than 3 years’ experience in a CS support department for high tech products. •Engineers with at least 2 years of ASML micro-lithography system experience with some supervisory and project coordination experience is preferred. •Direct customer interfacing experience. •Be able to influence with and without power. •Ability to thrive in a very dynamic and high pace environment. •Open for cultural differences and able to work with a site of different cultures and WOW. •Motivated, pro-active, self-driven, and flexible. •Good coordination, communication and customer skills. •Good documentation skills. •Multi-task team player with good ability to work under different working environment pressures. •Good team player and committed to the success of ASML. •Verbal and written language skills in English.

Skills

To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

• Shapes the needs of the customer to achieve 95% availability goal.

• Structurally approaches a problem in terms of “What” and “How” and with what resources.

• Take ownership for consequences of chosen priorities.

Are you a team player who want to be brilliant and visible in the ASML CS EUV organization? Apply this job to help CS by leading escalations logically and sharply with your communication skills to reach agreement among Local team, GSC and D&E to get the problem solved effectively.

Role and responsibilities

To understand urgency and political situation.
Support, identify, and resolve exceptions to the standard escalation process.
Leading cross-competency and high complexity technical discussion.

Education and experience

You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.

Able to lead discussion logically and narrow down problems effectively.

Be used to work under multi-culture and nations of environment.
High awareness to the life cycle of escalation to drive escalation promptly.
Stress resistant and strong leadership to difficult tasks.
Multiple tasking and have ability to set the right priority.
Capability to identify the stakeholders in the complex working environment.
Flexibility for oversea and domestic traveling based on requirement.
Prominent communication skill to bridge local team toward GSC and D&E
Strong commitment and Leadership with the mindset of NEVER GIVE UP.

【工作項目】 
（一）編務協助：整理稿件、學術格式校對、關鍵字查詢、電子書管理及開發。
（二）專書編輯：編輯、文案、校稿、看印、文宣製作等。
（三）活動執行：協辦新書發表會及其他推廣活動。
（四）其他編務相關協助及其他上級交辦處理事項。

【條件】
 （一）大學畢業（含）以上，中文、歷史或傳播科系尤佳。（請檢附畢業證書影本）。
（二）對社科領域相關議題有興趣。
（三）具一年以上出版相關經驗尤佳。
（四)  文字及表達能力佳，擅資料整合，以及擁有良好的邏輯思考。
（五）具高度責任感、有團隊精神、肯學習、時間觀念佳。
（六）熟悉Windows Office如word、excel、PowerPoint等文書處理軟體，以及Photoshop及Illustrator等應用軟體。

【其他】
（一）特別休假：依勞動基準法辦理。
（二）試用期：試用期3個月，試用期滿成績及格者，予以正式僱用；成績不及格者，停止僱用。

job_name: 視覺創意設計師 (新竹分公司-草禾綠)
cust_name: 覺享國際事業有限公司
job_detail:
HI 我們是草禾綠國際創意(https://reurl.cc/OAgAry)

工作上蒐集生活上的感動、與人們情感結合、找尋人事時地物上的美好，擅⻑用這些日常的痕跡，以活動撰寫出有溫度的故事。

我們是一群生活體驗的狂熱者，留心於生活上的美感與細節，不放棄任何好玩新奇的可能，挑戰新鮮事物是最大的養分。 

我們的辦公室位於經國路上的森SPACE/全台第一間無印良品設計辦公室(https://reurl.cc/41O1GV)，擁有無印辦公用品、無印咖啡，相信沉浸在非傳統辦公空間的環境，能帶給我們改變思考的工作方式。

面試需準備3分鐘內PPT做自我介紹，告訴我們你的個人特質、工作專長等，尋找熱愛生活、溫暖、負責、有創造力、有美感的你，草禾綠歡迎你的加入。

--------------------------------------------------

活動業需要具有良好的溝通整合及簡報能力，對於簡報：編寫、創意發想、資源整合都有基本的概念或想法，工作時需進行大量與人之間的溝通，需要有良好的溝通能力及EQ。

工作項目：
一、主要針對各活動專案的設計進行溝通、發想、設計、產出。
細部主要工作如下：
1. 平面設計：活動主視覺設計、活動延伸物設計(背板、立牌、邀卡、EDM等)
2. 活動佈場設計：活動佈場規劃、效果合圖、施工圖繪製等
3. 各類型印刷物設計
4. 協助專案設計面構想
5. 協助專案設計發包製作
6. 活動支援協助事宜、主管交辦事項 
7. 具汽車駕照（實際可上路）

加分事項：
1. 對尺寸(數字)，敏感細心
2. 擁有一定程度的美感，並能持續自我提升
3. 良好的溝通能力、可獨立完成工作
4. 能夠接受商業要求(藝術家不適合)
skill: 視覺設計相關知識, 廣告設計概念, 活動會場佈置, 展場設計規劃

job_name: LADY KELLY甜點門市兼職人員-新竹巨城
cust_name: 凱莉小姐股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們是一間擁有實體門市以及電商官網的甜點店，主要銷售產品有彌月蛋糕、精緻點心、伴手禮餅乾、生日蛋糕等等。成為「一間傳遞幸福的甜點店」是品牌的初心，我們需要志同道合的夥伴，一起完成理想與實踐可能，提供消費者更美好的消費體驗。

【歡迎成為我們夥伴】 
1.喜歡微笑的溫暖夥伴，把幸福甜點的祝福傳達給消費者
2.對服務業充滿熱忱，願意面對挑戰，協助顧客解決困擾
3.求知慾強、願與團隊夥伴一起面對困難、解決問題
4.認真負責任絕對是必要哦！

(一) 主要工作內容：
1.介紹商品並提供有溫度的消費服務(服務技巧、客訴處理、產品面銷)
2.商品活動促銷宣傳、門市活動推廣
3.協助門市形象佈置、商品包裝、門市櫃點陳列佈置
4.負責門市店務經營、推動業績目標達成與相關行政作業
5.產品包材設備進貨與管理(庫存管理/盤點、設備維護)
6.每日清潔維護店內環境整潔
7.每月門市共學會議

(二)工作時間：
1.排班制；每週可排班至少3-4天，可配合假日排班 *遵循勞基法規定
2.時薪制於國定假日依照當天出勤的工作時數，計算發給雙倍薪

(三)福利制度
1.表現良好，考核通過者可轉為正職
2.不定期員工聚餐


歡迎參考我們官方網站，了解我們更多：http://www.ladykelly.com.tw/

job_name: LADY KELLY甜點門市正職人員-新竹巨城
cust_name: 凱莉小姐股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們是一間擁有實體門市以及電商官網的甜點店，主要銷售產品有彌月蛋糕、精緻點心、伴手禮餅乾、生日蛋糕等等。成為「一間傳遞幸福的甜點店」是品牌的初心，我們需要志同道合的夥伴，一起完成理想與實踐可能，提供消費者更美好的消費體驗。

【歡迎成為我們夥伴】 
1.喜歡微笑的溫暖夥伴，把幸福甜點的祝福傳達給消費者
2.對服務業充滿熱忱，願意面對挑戰，協助顧客解決困擾
3.求知慾強、願與團隊夥伴一起面對困難、解決問題
4.認真負責任絕對是必要哦！

(一) 主要工作內容：
1.介紹商品並提供有溫度的消費服務(服務技巧、客訴處理、產品面銷)
2.商品活動促銷宣傳、門市活動推廣
3.協助門市形象佈置、商品包裝、門市櫃點陳列佈置
4.負責門市店務經營、推動業績目標達成與相關行政作業
5.產品包材設備進貨與管理(庫存管理/盤點、設備維護)
6.每日清潔維護店內環境整潔
7.每月門市共學會議


(二)工作時間：
1.排班制，每2週休4日
本公司依勞基法採用4週變形工時排班
2.月休：每月月休8-11天 
遵循勞基法規定，月休國定紅字天數
3.工作班制：早班、中班、晚班

4.連續假日與國定節慶假日須配合排班
5.特休年假 *遵循勞基法規定
六個月以上一年未滿者，三日
一年以上二年未滿者，七日
二年以上三年未滿者，十日

※三個月試用期後，會依工作表現調整薪資※
表現良好，每年度考核通過者可晉升儲備幹部

【加分條件】
1. 具蛋糕/彌月/精品銷售經驗加分
2. 通過丙級、乙級門市服務技術士技能檢定
3. 通過烘焙丙級西點證照檢定

歡迎參考我們官方網站，了解我們更多：http://www.ladykelly.com.tw/

job_detail:
客戶的成長是我們最重視的一環，你將是團隊與客戶溝通的橋樑。你需在第一線支援客戶，瞭解需求、解決問題、協助客戶成功導入，將客戶的需求反饋給產品團隊，從而協助公司打造更棒的產品。因此，你將有機會與業務部門和產品部門同事緊密合作，負責協助餐飲客戶導入系統及成長。

- 工作說明：
・Key Account 客戶關係管理，Up Selling，客戶續約維護等工作
・提供即時協助，處理客戶訊息，為客戶解決問題；
・為餐飲品牌客戶提供系統導入的支援、培訓及諮詢；
・深入瞭解你訂！產品細節並快速反應解決方案；
・觀察市場及行銷策略資訊、掌握跨渠道自動化再行銷的操作，並能為客戶提供有效建 議，提升客戶使用率和銷售轉換率；
・協助優化並製作教學文件、FAQ、教學Blog等內容提升客戶使用價值；
・積極了解客戶的用戶體驗及意見反饋，並進行分析整理，向產品團隊作出產品功能和用戶體驗提案；
・協助產品部門測試新功能，並從使用者角度提供意見；
・熟悉餐飲品牌電子商務市場趨勢與網路商品行銷概念；
・需有業績達成策略、行銷專案企劃、業務簡報能力；
・具備良好的談判技巧、與合作商店耐心溝通並合作。
・具有挑戰高業績目標的企圖心，以達成公司整體策略目標。

目前公司全遠端工作，需要一個有企圖心且自律心很強的你一起來改變世界！

ps：此工作會需要出差，需自備汽、機車...等交通工具。

緯創軟體是台灣唯一專注於全球交付的資訊服務上櫃公司。因應業績不斷成長，需要大量人才加入國際軟體開發團隊。

2.擅長ASP.NET、C#、ASP.NET MVC、SQL、Javascript、HTML
3.熟.NET、Framework 1.1以上
4.歡迎前端或後端工程師應徵

cust_name: 台趣科技有限公司
job_detail:
Intretech is an international company specializing in OEM/ODM for various consumer products. We 
work together with international teams and key component partners to deliver amazing consumer
products for our customers worldwide. We are looking for a self-motivated, active collaboration, and 
passionate team member to join our RD group.
In this key role, you will be responsible for managing complex scope projects from customer interaction, 
project initiation, driving consensus in resolving complex issues during bring-up, and interacting with 
different external vendors and our Xiamen’s engineering teams to ensure technical readiness for the 
product development. You will drive consensus across the team on topics such as architectural direction, 
performance key performance indicators, timelines, and more through the life of the product
development


【As an TPM, your responsibilities are listed below】
• Serve as the primary point of accountability for various consumer product TPM execution.
• Build and maintain strong working relationships across customers, RD engineering, marketing, and 
manufacturing team leadership.
• Deliver presentations and drive the decision-making process. Ensure tight inter-team coordination 
and communication.
• Develop tight relationships with cross-functional and sister organizations. Lead and interface with 
inter- and intra-organization partners/stakeholders for engineering issues/development to help 
solve technical problems, and in shaping the future products, or address new changes.
• Help to explore the market and interact with customers. Demonstrated ability to understand 
customer requirements and incorporate into business and technical decisions.
• Up to 20% domestic or international travel.



【Minimum qualifications】
• MS degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, Image 
Processing, Optical Engineering, Physics or equivalent practical experience.
• 2+ years of experience in consumer electronics products development or program management.
• Good communication and organizational skills.
other:
【Nice-to-have qualifications】
• Familiar with consumer products developing, launching and mass volume production process. 
• Familiar with any of the following fields: cameras, AR/VR, touch devices, projectors, imaging 
devices, image process, AI/CV, or IOT.
• Familiar with the market in consumer electronics products.

Description
 
At the beginning of new module research, IC design engineers and R&D engineers would cooperate closely with customers.
Therefore, once the new module technologies are developed, we could accomplish the goal of massive production and have customers’ new product launch in a short time.
In TSMC, you could be exposed to the most advanced module technologies, provide solutions to partners in global IC design eco-system, and ensure the competitiveness in power, performance, and area.
 
【Physical Designer】
The principal responsibility of the candidate is to perform complete netlist to GDS physical design steps which include floor plan, PNR, timing closure, IR/EM analysis, layout verification, formal verification, and other tape out related tasks. Candidate will work in a talented team to design advanced chips using cutting-edge process nodes while meeting high standard design requirements.
 
【Standard Cell Eng.】
1.Path finding of library characterization for leading edge tech nodes
2.Support industrial standard library kits generation and QC
3.In-house library generation flow and/or utility development
4.RC parasitic extraction analysis and APR related analysis
 
【Layout Eng.】
IC layout for advanced technology(Std. cell/Memory/AMS/IO), 
layout structure development for new technology, 
pathfinding for new technology development, 
customer engagement and layout support, 
design and technology co-optimization(DTCO), 
AI and automation for layout and physical design
 
【3DIC Eng.】
GPIO/ESD design, 3DIC/2.5DIC interface-IO design, and Si validation.
 
【System and Chip Design Solutions Development】
https://bit.ly/3lbCSzM 
 
【FE design & DFT】
1.Test chips development for advanced nodes, including physical design (APR), logic synthesis and DFT (Scan insertion + ATPG)
2.Design flow development for test chips design, which requires the programming skills, Tcl, Python, C-shell scripting etc.
3. Technology benchmarking for PPA evaluation of the advanced nodes
4.DTCO (Design & Technology Co-Optimization) pathfinding and development
 
【SRAM Eng.】
1.SRAM design in 7nm/5nm/3nm for mobile, high performance computing, IoT, automotive applications.
2.RRAM/MRAM, emerging memory development
3. In memory computing research and development
 
【Design Flow/Methodology】
1. Advanced technology process design kits(PDK) and tech files(DRC, LVS, RC, ...) development and technical support
2. Advanced technology design development flow development and technical support
3. Automation program development to support design kits and flow development productivity/quality

3. Good understanding of place and route flow

Description
 
In IIP (Integrated Interconnect & Packaging) team, you will initiate novel package concepts, own and drive advanced package development, new product package structure and configuration optimization. 
You will be responsible for 3DFabric technology research and development. Including InFO, CoWoS and SoIC process/integration development for customer's variety applications.
 
Integration:
Develop advanced 3DIC (InFO, CoWoS and SoIC) process and sustain baseline.
Package level reliability, failure mode analysis and improvement plan.
Customer technical interface, new tape out and lot handle.
Handover developed technologies to manufacturing groups for production.
Module Development:
Be responsible for CVD / PVD / CMP / Lithography / Etch / Polymer / Bonding / Clean module development for 3DIC projects.
New technology, materials survey, and process improvement on 3DIC package structures.
Process development and tool transfer to mass-production development.
Simulation:
Conduct risk assessment and provide mitigation plan for IC packages by simulation and experiment.
Practice FEM and DOE in problem solving and path finding particularly on packaging.
Continue improvement in simulation methodology, material modeling and script automation.
 
Qualifications
 
MS or Ph.D. in Chemical Engineering, Material Science, Chemistry, Physics, Mechanical Engineering, or related degree in Science or Engineering discipline
Experience in TV design or IC packaging is a plus
Good communication skill in Chinese and English
Hands-on participation and a strong sense of ownership is required
Strong technical problem-solving and analytical skills.
For simulation positions, mastering FEM software such as Ansys, LS-DYNA, Abaqus and others

job_name: Just Kitchen軒饌廚坊【新竹光復店】內場廚務人員
cust_name: 軒饌廚坊股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們的工作內容有，
1. 依照客人的點單，準備不同餐盒所需要的食材，且協助製作高品質外帶美食
2. 嚴謹細心可確實依循標準作業流程執行。
3. 配料前置作業-依食譜規定之比例調配醬料、調理包 。
4. 日常廚房環境清理、設備維護及餐具整潔。 
5. 確保製作食品流程均符合食品衛生管理的規定。 
6. 負責洗、剝、削、切各種食材，以完成烹飪的前置工作。
7. 協助前台和外送司機核對訂單內容。
8. 盤點庫存與補貨

JustKitchen(軒饌廚坊) 是由一群資深台灣餐飲業經理人而創立，我們創造出新時代宅經濟中高效率的餐飲模式，結合中央子母廚房、虛擬餐飲品牌及外送服務，為雲端廚房2.0也是共享廚房的進階版，提供消費者更多元、優質的餐食體驗，將餐廳的外送美食搬上消費者的餐桌，輕鬆解決消費者三餐的煩惱。

JustKitchen 透過策略性選點，建立樞紐供應鏈系統，同時與餐飲同業合作，並以衛星廚房的概念擴大供應鏈的範圍，快速建立餐飲品牌、拓展規模，目標成為台灣首屈一指的外送美食品牌。


在這裡你可以，
1. 學習到中西式的多元菜系料理
2. 未來的餐飲形態模式，提早來卡位，讓未來的廚師生涯佔有一席之地
3. 新創品牌，新的模式，你可以有更多的發展，餐飲透過雲端走向世界



●2020年在台灣設置第1間佔地約 400坪的樞紐廚房和10間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過8個美食品牌的餐點。

●2021年在台灣有21間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過20個美食品牌的餐點，拓展餐廳企業至海外，第一站香港。

●2022年在台灣有30間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過30個美食品牌的餐點。
拓展餐廳企業至東南亞(香港、新加坡、馬來西亞、菲律賓、泰國等)及北美市場。

job_name: 模組副工程師 (新竹) 儲備計畫
cust_name: 台灣積體電路製造股份有限公司(台積電)
job_detail:
【本職缺僅接受台積電官方網站投遞】
請至台積電官方網站投遞個人履歷表，此職缺履歷登錄網址:
https://tinyurl.com/y645yall

Description
Task：
●你喜歡動手解決精密機械、設備問題嗎？
●你想要突破半導體機台量產技術的極限，並持續挑戰未來科技的無限可能嗎？
●”模組副工程師”就是最適合你的位置，你將運用最先進的操作系統及AI人工智慧界面來進行設備維修、保養，與公司一起成長，共同突破機台的生產極限，成為推動半導體領域解決問題的工程專業人才！
Job Content
●負責半導體產品線機台設備維修及保養
●管理及改善機台零件系統、包含廠商與下包商之零件備品管理
●設計機台保養制具及流程改善以增進機台穩定性
●需配合日、夜/假日班輪值(約每四週輪值一次大夜班，一次輪值六天)
●加入TSMC ,訓練成為模組副工程師後, 您將享有:
  A.挑戰百萬年薪:
     高競爭力的薪資水準及獎酬機制
     分紅獎勵：每季依公司營運獲利分享業績獎金, 讓您1年、4季、12個月都能領取豐厚的薪資獎酬
  B.豐富寬廣的培訓發展，以及職涯升遷:
     專業訓練：全球最先進的中科訓練中心，兩個月全職訓練課程
     職涯升遷：垂直往上或水平轉換的職務機會，永不設限
  C.高規格的工作環境:
     美食饗宴：24小時提供多樣化異國美食
     休假優給：給予優於勞基法之彈性休假及病假
 
Qualifications
1.具備大學學歷，且為電機、電子、機械、自動控制、冷凍空調工程等相關科系
2.需有機械相關的基礎知識；有半導體製程知識者尤佳
3.需有問題解決、溝通表達、團隊精神、主動學習等能力
4.需有基本英文讀寫能力
5.需能配合大多數工作時間內，穿著無塵衣且將在無塵室環境中工作
6.需經過至多十二個月的相關訓練並通過認證，始得成為模組副工程師

薪資： 起薪38,000元起，年薪含分紅獎金、大夜津貼、額外獎金

job_name: 單位部門主管 ( 經理 Manager/ 組長 Supervisor )(具海外發展機會)
cust_name: 泰詠電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
海外工廠管理/品保主管/工程主管/製造主管

泰詠的市場定位在提供少量多樣、高難度、不成熟的客戶服務，我們在各單位流程與機制設計中不斷挑戰如何保有彈性靈活而又能整合出更大的效益。

【Summary】
此職務需有管理之實務經驗，並能開放不斷精進管理思維以支持公司永續獲利; 透過持續解決組織問題並優化機制或落實公司理念與政策使組織發展，帶領組織從系統的觀點促進與客戶、供應商三方之長期合作。

【Responsibility & Duties】
1. 帶領組織打破舊有觀念束縛、組織型態與劃分，朝向開放且彈性靈活之合作。
2. 需從自身開始，促進更多同仁思考自我於組織中之角色定位，從而以自我實現為目標看待工作。

促進團隊管理效能及執行物料排程，持續優化原物料及產品之收發、儲存及盤點機制確保料帳合一且供應即時準確。

[核心職務]
1. 彈性指揮、提前規劃、調度引導各組員完成備料，使備料達成零發錯料、零混料、兩小時發料準備時間
達成料帳合一，準確度>99%
2. 善用系統支援，使用數據分析掌握人員狀態，提升人員效率
3. 規劃倉管流程、儲位設計、動線管理使空間利用最佳化，建置改善更具效能的倉庫管理系統。
4. 分析整合流程標準工時、標準作業手法建立客觀標準以及內部教育訓練課程以提升人員知識技能

若您有著靈活開放的特質，能跳脫經驗的束縛進而思考不同的可能性;
若您能成熟的面對問題，並參與跨單位的合作以因應未來的變化與挑戰。
若您是認真負責的人，渴望能不斷提升自我，正在尋找一個能跳脫形式與套路而願意且注重核心與本質的環境。

在泰詠有很大的機會與空間扮演不同的角色，並學習如何從系統的角度及管理的觀點看待事情，歡迎你主動應徵討論合作的可能性。

job_name: 學生實習 Spring Internship Program - Optical and Sensing Technology Intern
cust_name: 羅技電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
Spring Internship Program - Optical and Sensing Technology Intern ( Physics/Electro-Optical Sciences/Electro-Optical Engineering)

The Role:
You will be the member in Optical and Sensing Technology team to study the cosmetic lighting foundation for Logitech products.

Your Contribution:
Be Yourself. Be Open. Stay Hungry and Humble. Collaborate. Challenge. Decide and just Do. These are the behaviors you’ll need for success at Logitech. In this role you will:
•	You will be contributing to study the cosmetic lighting specification.
•	You will review the current Logitech spec and competitive analysis report, recategorize the lighting features, study if the spec is unsuitable and/or unreasonable, conduct the UX survey, and propose the suggestion of cosmetic lighting spec 2.0.
•	You will study the uniformity formula from literature or derive it by yourself, the new formula should highly reflect reality which means uniformity and human perception are highly correlated.
other:

•	Knowledge of 
o	Optics
o	Physics
•	Optical experiment

In addition, preferable skills and behavior
•	Good mathematic.
•	Be able to communicate in English, writing, and speaking.
•	Full time or part time with 3 full days/week. 

Education:
Bachelor or graduate degree in Physics, Electro-Optical Sciences or Electro-Optical Engineering.


Logitech is the sweet spot for people who are passionate about products, making a mark, and having fun doing it. cust_name: 泰詠電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
有效利用可支配資源，轉變為客戶滿意的產品/服務，創造產能與產值最佳化。
並善用公司擁有國/內外客戶及多樣化產品的優勢，發展自我的管理/統籌能力，帶領製造部同仁一同滿足甚至超越客戶的期待！

[核心職務]
1. 負責依公司之營運政策和方針執行廠區營運目標和製造部門績效的達成。
2. 負責製造部門資源的整合和精實，掌握生產品質與效率提升
  a) 針對生產異常進行排除改善以促進提升生產效能
  b) 生產材料耗損及需求的控管。
  c) 製程參數之軟體確效。
3. 負責人員認知引導、紀律與知識技能的提升
  a) 負責製造部門年度計畫的制定和推展。
  b) 帶領組長、領班與各崗位員工工作安排、監督與教育訓練。 
  c) 規劃各製程工段人員訓練，考核，以培養多能工技術員。
4. 負責品質暨環境系統的執行、推展、改善與認知引導。
  a) 負責製造部門和廠區6S及安全健康的推展和督導。
  b) 負責管理生產作業紀律、6S與環境要求及督導。
5. 執行跨部門的協調溝通，保證生產正常運行符合標準作業要求。

在泰詠有很大的發展空間與機會去扮演不同的角色，並學習用管理的觀點思考事情讓工作更有效能。其中的關鍵在於我們能否將認知開放，嘗試理解不同的可能性並持續的思考。我們希望引導同仁都能從自身的角度出發積極投入工作，用系統與流程的觀點看事情，掌握資訊與時效展現具體成果。 

若您自認邏輯思維能力出類拔萃，正在尋找的是一個能夠以追求自我發展為目標讓自己積極投入的工作，歡迎你主動應徵以討論更多合作的可能性。

job_name: 【品質系統暨製程品保】單位主管 (QE&QS Manager)
cust_name: 泰詠電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
帶領QS團隊，主導以TQM為目標之各項品質專案規劃與執行，帶領廠內各部門精實流程並提升品質觀念。

帶領QE團隊以符合客戶標準並落實持續之品質精進、提升與改善為目標，設計產品的品質以滿足客戶需求，主導產品自設計至量產過程中所進行之各環節分析與要求，以提升整體品質與產出。

【團隊核心功能】
1. 品質把關與提升的主要推動者
(1) 定期召開品質會議，維持品質改善機制、釐清品質原因並提出改善方案。
(2) 以生產低良率與集中性異常的改善，進而提升品質良率。
(3) 建立品質檢驗規範與方式，以有效能的追蹤模式，藉以符合廠內及客戶期待。

2 客訴問題之分析、回覆與改善狀況追蹤：
(1) 以妥善的溝通，體會客戶回饋的異常狀況，進而執行問題原因分析與改善督促。
(2) 確認改善方案的可行性，提高產品的安全水準。
(3) 針對有效的改善方案，建立標準化作業。

3. 
(1)負責公司ISO品質相關各系統之推行/執行/維護以及負責內部定期稽核/外部/客戶稽核
(2)負責訂定/推動/執行本公司ESD系統管理,以符合ANSI-ESD S20.20之相關規範及量規儀器設備之規劃及校驗安排與執行

Logitech is an amazing place to work because it is full of authentic people who are inclusive by nature as well as by design. cust_name: 羅技電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
The purpose of this full-time job is to support the Global Commercial Sales Operations team on the critical topic of Sales Compensation & Commissions.
Working under the guidance of a senior member of the "Sales Operations" team, and in close coordination with the "People & Culture" (P&C) departments, 
your contribution will primarily cover the:

- Preparation / consolidation of the list of. "Eligible Employees" for the entire Asia Pacific region in collaboration with P&C and upload into Oracle.
- Collaboration with Sales Operations & Finance teams in countries to ensure commission targets as well as actual performance & payout ratios are captured, finalized, and uploaded into Oracle.
- Calculation of the commission payout amounts based on eligibility, payout scores & prorated time if required (joiners, leavers, LOAs, other changes…)
- Creation, validation & upload of commission statements (commission score %, commission payout amounts) for each employee.
- Preparation of the commission payout related reportings for all employees in the Region.
- Various support to the SalesOps and/or People & Culture teams related to sales compensation analyses or reporting, for the Asia Pacific Region.

In a second stage, the successful candidate might also be involved in other related projects, including but not limited to:
- Development of enhanced analytics around Performance / Payout
- Global harmonization of Sales Compensation models & schemes
- Implementation of a Global Sales Compensation system

The main interactions are expected to be with the Global Sales Operations team and with the local Sales Operations and/or Business Finance Managers, as well as with "People & Culture" departments ("People Services", "Total Reward", "Payroll"). Direct connections with the Key Account Managers (KAMs) and/or Country Managers might also be required.

cust_name: 羅技電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
The Team and Role:

We are seeking a Senior Manager, APAC Accounting to lead our regional APAC general ledger and payroll teams. The candidate will report to the Head of Global Accounting and Consolidation within the Controllership Organization and will have significant interaction with teams across Controllership and Finance including Corporate and Regional Controllership, Business Finance, Treasury, Tax, IT and Legal to ensure accurate, complete, and timely financial statements on a monthly, quarterly, and annual basis. We are looking to hire a motivated team player with strong initiative, good communication skills and experience as an accounting leader in the APAC region to join our team in the role of Senior Manager, APAC Accounting. This is a high impact, high visibility role supporting the global Finance Organization at Logitech.

Your Contribution:

Be Yourself. Be Open. Stay Hungry and Humble. Collaborate. Challenge. Decide and just Do. Share our passion for Equality and the Environment. These are the behaviors and values you’ll need for success at Logitech. In this role you will:

- Manage the APAC regional monthly, quarterly, and annual close processes in coordination with the global close calendar to support accurate and timely quarterly/annual SEC financial statement audit procedures under US GAAP

- Oversight of the APAC region’s month-end and quarter-end close processes, including but not limited, to review of journal entries, review of account reconciliations, review of control activities and preparation of balance sheet fluxes. Monitor and communicate Close status, and ensure all teams within the APAC region are on track with the Close calendar

- Own the APAC end-to-end payroll process to ensure successful execution of the monthly payroll process across all APAC legal entities

- Responsible for all statutory accounting activities within APAC to ensure timely and accurate preparation of financial statements; coordination of external audit activities; stay informed on current legislation/requirements that impact APAC accounting

- Serve as a change agent for system improvements including automation and partner with key stakeholders across regions to identify opportunities to automate and streamline the monthly/quarterly close and payroll processes. Work with IT on system enhancements and/or implementations

- Perform processes and procedures to comply with SOX 404 controls and maintain updated SOX documentation to support internal and external audit SOX review processes for all APAC accounting and payroll activities

- Develop, coach, train, and instruct the APAC team to utilize best practices
Participate in cross-functional team special projects and initiatives

- Build strong partnerships within Corporate and Regional Controllership Teams, Regional Finance, and IT to enable accuracy of financial statements and to support the business on cross functional initiative/projects
other:
Key Qualification:

For consideration, you must bring the following minimum skills and experiences to our team:

-Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance or Business

-Minimum of 8-10 years in an accounting management position at a global company; 4-5 years of experience in a Big 4 public accounting firm is highly preferred along with relevant SOX knowledge

-Certified Public Accountant (CPA) or equivalent certification required
English fluency required

-Proven experience in understanding and documenting APAC countries statutory GAAP differences compared to US GAAP

-Strong data analytical and problem-solving skills with keen attention to detail and accuracy as well as ability to see the bigger picture

-Ability to effectively prioritize in order to manage multiple tasks and competing priorities

-Inspire the continued development of the team, ensuring appropriate growth of each team member while fostering a spirit of continuous improvement

-Strong communication and project management skills, with the ability to work independently and in a team environment; has experience working within a fast paced, global organization

-Ability to translate and communicate complex accounting information to various audiences to support informed business and financial decision making

-Strong change-oriented mindset with experience in managing process improvement initiatives

job_name: Customer Supply Chain Order Management Specialist (1-year contract)
cust_name: 羅技電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
The Role:

You think outside the box, you are not afraid of failure, you bring passion and push boundaries, you challenge, you don’t accept the easy answer and you like to translate commercial challenges into supply chain solutions. Then we are looking for you to be part of our Asia Mature Markets Customer Supply Chain team. The role of Customer Supply Chain (CSC) Order Management Specialist is responsible for the overall management of end to end customer supply chain operations for our customers in Australia, New Zealand, Korea, and Pacific Islands.

Together with Logistics and our distribution partners you will ensure timely delivery of the right products at the right time towards our customers, drive operational efficiencies and participate in continuous process improvement activities that drive best in class supply chain metrics, cost, service, inventory, and cycle time. By leveraging data analytics and market knowledge, you will support and optimize revenue growth for assigned customers.

The CSC Order Management Specialist is responsible to actively manage order backlog, allocation of inventory based on scheduling priorities, monitoring the logistics execution of our outsourced logistics partner (RCC) but also with our key channel partner. He/she will be in daily contact with internal and external customers and communicate actively on the fulfillment of fulfillment strategies. Continuous process improvement to enable more efficiencies in our end to end supply chain to drive improvements in our key metrics cost, service, inventory and cycle time is part of your mindset.

The Key Success Factor:  

Quick thinking in identifying operational bottlenecks/challenges and seeks out opportunities to improve processes and increase efficiencies. Tactically develop and support cost savings initiatives to drive continuous improvement of key supply chain metrics - cost, service, inventory and cycle time.

Be Yourself. Be Open. Stay Hungry and Humble. Collaborate. Challenge. Decide and just Do. These are the behaviors you’ll need for success at Logitech.

Job Description:

-Build a collaborative environment where information is shared efficiently and effectively with internal and external business partners and stakeholders

-Responsible for the team's commitment to clean order management relative to ensuring accuracy of delivery dates, pricing, fulfillment and execution

-Monitor to ensure on-time delivery for orders through delivery metrics and partnering with Logistics

-Manage and actively publish critical reports on in-stock, on-time in-full deliveries and channel inventory

-Day to day backlog management (order scheduling, backlog cancellation, allocation plans, improve overdue backlog, reduce aging backlog, large order management).

-Working closely with the RCC to improve logistics services and customer compliance with order policy

-Keep driving process change to improve efficiency and automation to deliver on service metrics (OTIF, Order Aging) and continuous improvement to drive efficiencies on end to end supply chain (cost, service, inventory, cycle time)

-Continuously look for ways to improve customer service and predictability

-Work together to create standardization, automation and optimisation among projects and processes

other:

-Must be proficient in reading, writing and speaking English

-Strong in Excel, Google Sheets, and/or Tableau skills

-Drive scalable process change and automation to improve end-to-end supply chain efficiencies and to meet key supply chain metrics in terms of cost, service, inventory, and cycle time. You embrace continuous learning and process improvement

-Analytical skills including data evaluation, identification, solution development and implementation

-Ability to multitask and prioritize work while keeping outstanding attention to detail

-Self-motivated and goal-oriented, with a positive proactive attitude and a high degree of initiative

-Comfortable in a dynamic and international environment

job_name: 網路行銷業務人員-新竹(32,000底薪+獎金)
cust_name: 年寶實業有限公司
job_detail:
你喜歡做業務工作？
你喜歡與人交談？
你喜歡幫助別人？
你只想踏實的工作？
你知道網路是未來的趨勢？
你曾做過保險、房仲、直銷等業務工作？


 
以下是真實案例：
<<十年行政3萬月薪小資女，一年成為月薪7倍行銷總監>>
有位同仁，出社會後一直在做行政工作，輾轉經歷過三家公司，她在這份工作上表現的很優秀，她也不會覺得日子過不下去，因為薪水算是一般過得去3萬多的水準。但她就是生活索然無味，工作每天都一樣。一晃眼十年過去了，她儼然看見了自己的未來工作面貌，似乎不會有甚麼改變了，總覺得年輕就這樣讓它過去了嗎？看看自己原公司的主管，她不是非常嚮往這樣的未來。後來她決定給自己一年時間，來挑戰我們的電子商務行銷人員，看她自己是否能適應，因為她一直覺得這份工作可能會很有趣。而現在一年過去了：她目前做的非常成功，不但月收入是從前的數倍，工時也比之前較短，重點是她還很快樂。為何會這樣呢？這就是當「工作」與「興趣」完美地結合在一起，使她產生了前所未有的質變，人生也就變得與之前格外不同地光明燦爛。
 
而我們的工作要甚麼樣的人才能勝任呢？「行銷業務人員」是屬於業務類型的，這份工作需要以下5種特質
1.要有目標：月收入是希望自己至少能達到台幣4萬以上，有顆積極奮鬥的心。
2.有四維八德：我們要維持良好的職場環境，所以我們這都是正直良善的人，不歡迎投機取巧者。
3.要有改進的心：我們不歡迎講不聽先生或是說不得小姐，因為那代表你無法進步，進而影響到公司整體工作環境。
4.要會基本的網路操作：諸如日常生活中的社群FB、LINE、IG、Youtube等等。
5.要明白網路係趨勢：這是無庸置疑的。
 
 
若您明白與認同上述簡介，歡迎您投下履歷，勇敢面試，年寶實業與您一起挑戰新生活！
 
以下則是您的任務挑戰，歡迎來闖關！
 
1. 負責找出實體或網路店家以及中小企業有興趣做網路行銷規劃者，進行開發。
2. 店家名單開發、電話拜訪以及約定拜訪。
3. 達成每月的公司目標。
4. 完成主管交接事項。
5. 時間自由彈性。
6. 可學習到更多有關現在最新的網路行銷。

*三個月試用期底薪28,000元 升正職32,000元

cust_name: 羅技電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
The Role:

Are you ready to join a team involved with designing exciting products for a great company? We are now looking for a Deputy Manager / Global Sourcing Specialist -  Mechanics/Tooling Related to join our team.

Your Contribution:

Be Yourself. Be Open. Stay Hungry and Humble. Collaborate. Challenge. Decide and just Do. These are the behaviors you’ll need for success at Logitech. In this role you will:

• Facilitate sourcing & procurement for ME related staffs including mechanics/hardware/tooling etc
• Facilitate & responsible for suppliers' management, price maintenance, cost improvement, and injection part / tooling analysis
• Facilitate the new suppliers' sourcing & vendor selection
• Responsible for the cost update & contract maintenance with suppliers & vendors. And Need to complete all of the related agreements
• Need to support BUs to develop ME related items for any RFI & RFQ 
• Facilitate the quarterly cost meeting
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通
other:
Key Qualifications:
For consideration, you must bring the following minimum skills and behaviors to our team:

• University Degree or above (Mechanical Engineering or Industrial Engineering is preferred.)
• High proficiency in spoken and written English
• At least 3 years all rounded sourcing experience in ME area
• Expert on cost breakdown and analysis
• Excellent communication, team work, interpersonal and negotiation skills, task orientated, problem solving. CPIM, CSCP, PMP certification is plus

Education:

University Degree or above.

Logitech is the sweet spot for people who are passionate about products, making a mark, and having fun doing it. As a company, we’re small and flexible enough for every person to take initiative and make things happen. But we’re big enough in our portfolio, and reach, for those actions to have a global impact. That’s a pretty sweet spot to be in and we’re always striving to keep it that way.

cust_name: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction to the job
Application engineer plays a unique role as technology enabler to support our customer continuously development in lithography of semiconductor industry.

Role and responsibilities
Application engineer supports ASML product in 3 phases:
Business development: translate customer requirement into potential business development
New product introduction: new platform insertion in customer R&D / Pilot Fab
High volume manufacturing: sustain installed base machine for on product performance issues

• Help new product business development include bridging D&E idea and customer requirement/demand.
• Familiar with semiconductor litho-process, optical & metrology mechanism, able to do on product troubleshooting under time pressure
• Able to understand customer’s needs and clearly describe the issues that customer is facing to internal stakeholders
• Act as the owner of customer requests and follow through. (customer interfacing, data collection, 1st hand analysis, etc)
• Escalate/Communicate the issues to ASML experts in headquarter when needed without losing the ownership. Drive for progress and containment/solution
• Able work and coordinate across departments to ensure smooth troubleshooting process
• Able to present and report clearly during internal and external meetings.

Education and experience
Master of Optical/Physical engineering, Material/Chemical science, Mechanical engineering
3 - 5 years in semiconductor industry, optical engineering

Skills
Working at the cutting edge of tech, you’ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve – and working together is the only way to do that. You won’t work in a silo. Instead, you’ll be part of a creative, dynamic work environment where you’ll collaborate with supportive colleagues. There is always space for creative and unique points of view. You’ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems.
To thrive in this job, you’ll need the following skills:

•Excellent English presentation and communication skills to interface internal (business development managers, project leaders, management) and external customers (mainly execution and mid to high management level).
•Troubleshooting skill, basic project management
•Basic programming skill (Matlab) will be plus

Diversity & Inclusion
ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Other information
This position is based in Hsinchu, working together with leading edge semiconductor customer. To fulfill customer’s needs, Application engineer always looking for potential improvement beyond current machine spec with supporting from different department (D&E/marketing/equipment engineering). Application engineer is creating value by integration of multiple professional area.

High quality people are a key asset to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive compensation and benefits packages to attract and retain the very best people and let them share in the success that they build. Our rewards philosophy is to attract and retain specific professional knowledge and competencies within the company by offering a competitive package in local markets where ASML is active.

Provide support to Synopsys's world-wide customers and field teams.
Solve complex technical problems involving software running on ARC processors (firmware, libraries, applications).
Provide technical content for Synopsys support site (Application Notes, Technical Articles, FAQs).
Feedback to R&D on product use models, quality, and enhancements.
